programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Aurora vuelve a la vida para el mundo y, con ella, regresa la esperanza de Lorenzo por recuperarla. La reanimación es televisada, Vanesa dice quién es Lorenzo y la prensa lo sorprende con preguntas del pasado. La doctora Rosales se vuelve una amenaza.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Las mentiras de Natalia salen a la luz y Lorenzo termina por confirmar que el padre de Nina es su mejor amigo. Una muerte misteriosa atrae más la atención sobre la clínica. Blanca decide hacer un viaje con César, mientras Aurora cae en la tentación.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: La pasión entre Aurora y Martín se despierta. Lorenzo empieza a descubrir los engaños de los que ha sido víctima por culpa de su pasado. Aurora les confiesa a padre e hijo que el diario de Aurora era mentira y formaba parte de su plan de venganza.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Blanca es víctima de las mentiras de su familia. Aurora revela en público que ella es su hija, cuando Lorenzo vuelve para cuestionarla. Gustavo está muy preocupado por los problemas que se le avecinan y Aurora se ve forzada a mentir nuevamente.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Lorenzo quiere llegar a las últimas consecuencias con Natalia y Gustavo para proteger a los que quiere. Blanca está en peligro de muerte y Nina cree que Natalia ha perdido la razón. Elizabeth tiene motivos para amenazar a Gustavo con contar todo.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Natalia se envenena por la pérdida del amor de Lorenzo, pero tiene un plan por detrás. Aurora logra deshacerse de Martín y llega a tiempo para salvar a su hija. Emociones encontradas reaparecen entre ella y Blanca revelando lazos maternales.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Las explicaciones de una traición del pasado no son suficientes. La culpa del presente demuestra todo lo contrario. Aurora le dice a Lorenzo que su amor murió bajo el frío. Gustavo anuncia que Natalia y el bebé que espera están fuera de peligro.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Lorenzo no se da por vencido para recuperar el amor de Aurora, pero debe enfrentarse a una decisión que podrá cambiar su vida. Gustavo recibe un mensaje anónimo en el celular y culpa de ello al doctor Williams. Aurora decide navegar por internet.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Lorenzo intenta recuperar el amor de Aurora. Martín está emocionado y Vanesa le asegura que sabe dónde está la hija de Aurora. Ella escucha el mensaje que Martín le deja en internet. Elizabeth aprovecha la conferencia de prensa para anunciar una boda.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Aurora se resiste al amor de Lorenzo, sabe que no puede amar a Martín en medio de tantas mentiras. Natalia comete el peor error de su vida y Lorenzo le pide una prueba de ADN del bebé que está esperando. Blanca busca infundirle celos a César.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Para Aurora, amar ahora es muy confuso y aún no sabe que Martín y Blanca tienen un plan para ayudarla. Gustavo intenta frenar las actitudes de Elizabeth, pero puede ser muy tarde. Lorenzo, a solas con Aurora, le pide que se den una oportunidad.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Con un beso, Aurora olvida un mundo de promesas a Martín, la cercanía de Lorenzo logra confundir sus sentimientos. Aurora será quien revele sus propios secretos. Ernesto le dice a César que él también es un adicto al sexo.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Natalia se las juega todas para recuperar a Lorenzo en medio de los celos y las trampas contra Aurora. Blanca y César apuestan a la seducción. Aurora no recuerda qué pasó antes de su desmayo y tiene una nueva desilusión con Lorenzo, que sigue sedado.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Grantt Culliver, warden of one of Alabama's toughest prisons, Holman Correctional Facility, doesn't miss a beat in getting into a disruptive inmate's face, but he's also compassionate and gentle when the situation calls for it.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Of the nearly 1,000 inmates at Holman, the 200 most dangerous must be segregated from the rest; Bobby Gilbert, or "Snake", has spent 19 of his 43 years in the solitary confinement of Ad Seg. because of his violent behavior.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Correctional officers are outnumbered 10 to 1 and are constantly searching over 1,000 inmates to find their home-made weapons, which are very easy to conceal; hours after the Lock Up crew wraps shooting, an inmate is stabbed in the honor dorm.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Holman houses over 170 men who have been sentenced to death and are awaiting execution, as well as 360 who are serving life sentences without parole; all are living with the inevitable: that their only chance of getting out will be inside a coffin.

programme.title: Lockup: Holman: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Burnout is a constant problem and unexcused absences create staff shortages at Alabama's Holman Correctional Facility; that means that designated jobs, like cell searches, which each shift has a requirement to perform, don't always get done.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Producers offer candid interviews and previously unaired footage of some of the most hardcore prison stories.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bucciarati and gang hide inside a turtle aboard their train hurtling toward Florence as Mista fights to keep Pesci's body-piercing fish hook from ensnaring his brain. Prosciutto, meanwhile, has released his Stand, rapidly aging everyone on board.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: To save his squad, Bucciarati risks all by grabbing hold of Prosciutto and hurling himself off the speeding train, only to be saved by Pesci’s hook. Now, as Pesci savagely fishes for his victim’s heart, Bucciarati’s resolve reaches stunning heights.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bucciarati and crew head to Venice by car, after a near-death encounter with Pesci. Unbeknownst to them, Melone from the Hitman Team has created an atomizing ancillary Stand from Bruno’s blood and the body of an unsuspecting female train passenger.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Giorno fights transmutation with transmutation as he weaponizes his own severed hand and imbues inanimate objects with life against Melone’s baby Stand. Giorno and team now must learn that the road ahead to Santa Lucia train station is paved with ice.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Ghiaccio's Stand, White Ice is able to envelop him like a bodysuit and able to freeze everything around him to extremely low temperatures. Giorno and Mista somewhat make it to Venice, despite being partially frozen by Ghiaccio...

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: By revealing to each other a fearless embrace of the unknown, Giorno and Mista emerge victorious against Ghiaccio. Now, a single member of Bruno’s group must face a single bell tower, a single elevator shaft, and a single menacing task.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: In the crypt of a Venetian church, Bruno discovers not only the brutal truth behind the Boss’s true intentions but also the unstoppable Stand power he wields, a power that leaves Bruno in a pool of blood and in a moral quandary.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: To save his squad, Bucciarati risks all by grabbing hold of Prosciutto and hurling himself off the speeding train, only to be saved by Pesci’s hook. Now, as Pesci savagely fishes for his victim’s heart, Bucciarati’s resolve reaches stunning heights.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bucciarati and crew head to Venice by car, after a near-death encounter with Pesci. Unbeknownst to them, Melone from the Hitman Team has created an atomizing ancillary Stand from Bruno’s blood and the body of an unsuspecting female train passenger.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Giorno fights transmutation with transmutation as he weaponizes his own severed hand and imbues inanimate objects with life against Melone’s baby Stand. Giorno and team now must learn that the road ahead to Santa Lucia train station is paved with ice.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Ghiaccio's Stand, White Ice is able to envelop him like a bodysuit and able to freeze everything around him to extremely low temperatures. Giorno and Mista somewhat make it to Venice, despite being partially frozen by Ghiaccio...

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: By revealing to each other a fearless embrace of the unknown, Giorno and Mista emerge victorious against Ghiaccio. Now, a single member of Bruno’s group must face a single bell tower, a single elevator shaft, and a single menacing task.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: In the crypt of a Venetian church, Bruno discovers not only the brutal truth behind the Boss’s true intentions but also the unstoppable Stand power he wields, a power that leaves Bruno in a pool of blood and in a moral quandary.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Peer into the complex personal pasts of Bucciarati and his fellow gang members, and uncover the thread that unites this diverse group of fighters into a single team and single expression of resolve.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Shippo is a demon fox whose father was killed by the Thunder Brothers: Hiten and Manten.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Inuyasha goes to save Kagome from Manten. Hiten devours the sacred jewel shard that Manten had and absorbs his demon powers.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Kagome has returned to the present day to take a test. As she does, a noh mask, the Mask of Flesh, begins a violent search for the Shikon Jewel shards.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Kagome sees a Soul Piper, a demon that consoles the spirits of children. She helps Mayu, a girl who is about to become an evil spirit, to pass on.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Half-demon Inuyasha's secret is that he becomes human once a month. That day, Inuyasha and the gang meet Nazuna and stay at a mountain temple.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: The ogress, Urasue, robs the grave of Kikyo, the priestess who sealed away Inuyasha fifty years ago.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Kikyo is revived when Kagome's soul flows into her. She tries to kill Inuyasha, but Kagome takes back her soul.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Miroku, a womanizing delinquent priest, has been collecting Shikon Jewel shards and steals Kagome's shards.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Experts Charlie Ross and Margie Cooper begin the day at Abernyte in Perth and Kinross, before heading to an auction in the Highlands at Dingwall.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: On the last day of their Scottish road trip, Charlie Ross and Margie Cooper begin at Nairnshire in Auldearn before traveling through Aberdeenshire and heading to auction at Hamilton, South Lanarkshire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Thomas Plant kick off the week in the seaside town of Morecambe, traveling through Cornforth and Chorely on their way to auction in Clitheroe town.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Road trippers Paul Laidlaw and Thomas Plant start their second day in Preston, Lancashire before they make their way towards an auction in the Cheshire town of Nantwich.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Thomas Plant begin the day in Birmingham before traveling through Lichfield, Shenton, and Leicester ending up at an auction in Stamford, Lincolnshire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Thomas Plant kick off the fourth day of their road trip in Cromer, Norfolk, and make their way through Holt and Norwich to the auction at Colchester, Essex.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: On their final day, Paul Laidlaw and Thomas Plant begin in Wendover, Buckinghamshire, and wind their way to auction in Bedford.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The first day of Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon's Scottish road trip begins in the village of New Abbey, takes them from Dumfries and Galloway through Ayrshire and into Renfrewshire, and finishes at an auction in Paisley.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The second day of the trip for Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon starts in Glasgow before passing through Falkirk on the way to the auction in Dundee.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Road trippers Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon start in Dundee and travel through Forfar and Invururie on their way to auction in Aberdeen.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon begin this leg in Aberdeen before traveling through the Coastal town of Cullen and on to auction at Elgin in Moray.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: On the final day of their Scottish Road trip, Mark Stacey and Catherine Southon start in Rait in Perth and Kinross then travel through Dundee and Arbroath before heading to auction in Edinburgh.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: James Braxton and Helen Hall begin their first leg of the trip in Oswestry in Shropshire, auction in Carmarthen, Carmarthenshire, and then cross the Welsh border towards Montgomery and Machynlleth in Powys.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the second leg of the trip and James Braxton and Helen Hall begin their day in Newport in the county of Gwent. The duo then heads to Cardiff before crossing the English border for auction in Wotton-under-Edge in Gloucestershire.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Featuring the story of a watercolor purchased for two cigarettes in a WWII POW camp.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team visit East Kirkby airfield in Lincolnshire.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team pay a second visit to East Kirkby Airfield in Lincolnshire.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team head to Exmouth on the Devon coast.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Roadshow spreads out its picnic rug in the beautiful gardens of Powis castle in Wales.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team make some surprising finds at Rochester Cathedral.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team returns to Rochester Cathedral, including a toast with Napoleon's drinking glass.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visit an iconic modernist building, the De La Warr Pavilion at Bexhill-on-Sea.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visit the Queen Mother's former residence, and brave the Scottish weather.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team are at St George's Hall in Liverpool to uncover some valuable finds.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team return to St George's Hall in Liverpool to uncover some more valuable finds.

programme.title: Round Planet
programme.desc: Revealing the harsh realities of life in the Antarctic, especially for the penguins.

programme.title: Round Planet
programme.desc: Life on islands often evolves some very weird and wonderful survival solutions.

programme.title: Round Planet
programme.desc: Exploring the complex culture, society, and intelligence of our closest ancestors.

programme.title: Round Planet
programme.desc: Rainforests are some of Earth's oldest and most established ecosystems.

programme.title: Round Planet
programme.desc: Bears are some of the planet's largest and most fearsome predators.

programme.title: Seasonal Wonderlands
programme.desc: New England is the stage for the most incredible color change on earth, when the vivid greens of summer give way to the golds and reds of autumn.

programme.title: Seasonal Wonderlands
programme.desc: Svalbard in the Arctic spends many months of the year in complete darkness, an unrelenting frozen winter with temperatures down to 40 below Celsius.

programme.title: Seasonal Wonderlands
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta is a lush wetland of islands and lagoons in the middle of the vast, featureless Kalahari Desert.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Animals appear to have stretched their natural gifts to the limits, including giraffes and chameleons.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Curiosities lead to accusations of forgery.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough looks at some amazing quirks of evolution; he encounters two examples where nature has tinkered with the aging process.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the tusk of the narwhal and the spiral shells found on snails and ammonites.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Beautifully patterned or brightly colored animals attract the attention of collectors.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Female Komodo dragons can reproduce without contact with a male; female aphids can clone themselves to produce copies.

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: Rhinos and hedgehogs protect themselves with body armor in the form of thick skin.

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep17

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep18

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep19

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep19

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep21
programme.desc: El Titi es capturado y extraditado por la DEA. A Catalina le extraen la prótesis por el dolor tan fuerte que estaba sufriendo. Jessica hace el amor con Marcial, le cuenta cosas malas de su amiga. Catalina es llevada a urgencias por Pelambre.

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Catalina es informada por el médico que no puede volver a utilizar implantes por lo menos en un lapso de dos años. Marcial presenta a Jessica como su nueva esposa. El capitán Salgado es asesinado. Jessica se despide de su amiga con una excusa.

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Catalina visita a su familia. La mujer se ve con Pelambre, se entera el romance de Marcial y Jessica. La mujer le pide al guardaespaldas matar a Jessica en un restaurante, sin embargo Catalina se hace pasar por ella y es asesinada en vez de la Diabla

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Conozca la historia de Catalina, una joven que cegada por su ambición y las malas influencias llegará a un paraíso al que jamás desearía haber entrado.

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Albeiro es seducido por el cuerpo de la madre de Catalina. Catalina es violada en el establo por los hombres de Mariño. Bairon rechaza a Jimena pues él se percata que ella se va diariamente como acompañante con los mafiosos.

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bairon es atacado, el hombre se oculta en la casa de su madre Hilda. Caballo busca a Catalina para matarla y que no se entere su patrón que él le quito la virginidad a la mujer. Albeiro le propone matrimonio a su novia. La Diabla habla con los capos

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep4
programme.desc: La Diabla le consigue las modelos a Cardona y Morón. Albeiro le propone a Catalina irse a vivir juntos, ella lo rechaza. Catalina se entera de que está embarazada y aborta. Jessica lleva a su amiga a una fiesta de modelos realizada por mafiosos

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Catalina se separa de Albeiro por un tiempo por lo último que le ha ocurrido. Cardona se acuesta con Catalina, la mujer le pide dinero al mafioso para la operación de sus senos. Caballo es asesinado. Cardona le pide a la niña que sea su amante

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cardona le da el dinero a Catalina, la mujer junto a la Diabla averiguan la cotización de la operación de su busto. Hilda se emborracha con Albeiro. Orlando es asesinado. Catalina se encuentra con su novio y su madre ebrios, se enfada.

programme.title: Sin tetas no hay paraíso: S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Catalina le declara su amor a Albeiro, sin embargo le aclara el no poder volver junto a él en estos momentos. Catalina se encuentra en un bar con Cardona y el Titi, Cardona le da dinero para que siga siendo su amante. Albeiro duerme con Hilda.

programme.desc: Playing hooky from summer school, Lt. Mitch Buchannon's son Hobie gets dangerously involved with reckless jet skiers.

programme.desc: Eddie must come to terms with his past when he confronts a gang of "surf rats" lead by a former friend from his reform school days. Trevor begins to doubt his lifeguarding skill when his girlfriend almost drowns because of his arrogance.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: While housesitting for Craig and Gina, Eddie takes in a runaway whose life is threatened by her mobster boyfriend. Meanwhile, Trevor enters Baywatch rookie school to become a certified LA County lifeguard.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Eddie warns Shauni that her new boyfriend Andrew is not a good guy. She ignores Eddie until Andrew gives her a black eye. Meanwhile, Craig and Mitch must stop an out of control party boat before it crashes into the crowded Santa Monica pier.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Several people are murdered at the beach by a mysterious man in ghoulish make-up and Eddie is knocked unconscious by what he describes as a "cretin." Eddie's report is met with skepticism until the identity of the killer is dramatically revealed.

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Lovie says a viral video of her son Darnell shows him attacking his girlfriend & dragging her. Darnell says he doesn't recognize himself & he wants to apologize to the world. Brianna says the attack was one of three beatings her sister endured that night.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Cassie is stressed raising 4 children--Brinley, 15, smokes pot, vapes, and runs away, once claiming kidnapping. Cassie's husband, Jonah, with his drug & alcohol abuse, is a danger to her children. Dr. Phil enlists Brinley's help to enlighten the family.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Heather's son, Brandon, 15, died of an accidental overdose at her home; authorities say the teen swallowed & snorted Heather's morphine pills while drinking vodka and beer. Acquitted of charges, Heather says her ex-husband Brian continues to blame her.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Renee & Lee insist their little granddaughter is not safe in the care of her parents because they are severe alcoholics. Chris & Jessica admit to alcoholism yet insist they are great parents. Dr. Phil shows shocking footage of what home cameras captured.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Susie says she's at the end of her rope raising her 4-yr-old granddaughter & says daughter Adriana, 20, neglects her duties to spend time boyfriend Matt. Adriana strongly denies. Matt says he's judged for past drug use. Don't miss this emotional Dr. Phil.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Inside the “California House of Horrors” where 13 children were starved, chained and abused by their own parents. Family, neighbors and childhood friends speak about the tragedy. Cleveland kidnap survivor Michelle Knight sends a message to the children.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: After former friends Randi & Haley tell Brittany's history of harassing men & faking pregnancies, Dr. Phil talks to Brittany and asks her to prove she is pregnant. What sent Brittany storming off stage? See the backstage conversation with Dr. Phil.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kristle, Kayla & Patrick say mom Sherry has blown a $250,000 inheritance in 11 months, with $500 bar tabs & new motorcycles. But that's not it. They say mom takes non-prescribed pills, washes them down with rum & has pulled out a loaded gun while arguing.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil's guests engage in a heated debate about the rights of men and women when a child is conceived out of wedlock. Should the biological father be forced to pay child support for a child he didn't know existed or did not plan?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: In 2012, Amanda accused her ex-husband, George, a U.S. Army veteran, of molesting her then 7-year-old daughter, & he was sentenced to life in prison. George's parents, Harold and Cindy, believe their son was wrongfully convicted.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues conversation with Shemida and her sister, Dana, who says Shemida’s 70-plus diagnoses are tearing the family apart. Dr. Phil unites this family in an effort to find answers. Is Shemida really sick, or is she addicted to attention? Part 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Heather says husband Anthony put rubbing alcohol in her contact lens case, which he denies. Anthony says he does have anger issues after returning from Iraq & admits to abuse of Heather's dog. Robin McGraw issues a strong warning about domestic violence.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jean says her 17-year-old daughter, Cheyenne, was the all-American girl , a cheerleader, track star and straight-A honor student until she began dating Josh, a 28-year-old divorced father. Dr. Phil takes a look at Josh's history, should Jean be concerned?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: New details of Rebecca Zahau's death: Was the scene staged to deceive police it was suicide? Renowned forensic pathologist Dr. Cyril Wecht reveals his findings to the family after examining Rebecca's exhumed remains. Does he think foul play was involved?

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampketts come across Narda and Yerko, two gypsies, who decide to run a scam on the unsuspecting clan. Involving both a marriage prophecy and a curse, the crooks see the families' naivety to their advantage.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts are visited by a real king, Alexander, so Granny and Mrs. Drysdale start matchmaking. The broke royal needs a wealthy bride and courts Ellie. Drysdale niece Doreen is tricked by a costumed Jethro and ends up unimpressed.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts acquire a hippopotamus when an advertising scheme originated by banker Drysdale backfires.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Banker Milburn 'Drysdale's precocious 11-year-old nephew swindles the hillbillies of all the valuable art objects in their mansion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Clampett has inherited a castle in the English countryside. Jethro insists that everyone, except Granny, wear the royal raiment's of Elizabeth (the First, of course).

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts head to England to visit the castle Jed inherited. Misunderstandings abound, from Jethro mistaking San Francisco for London, to the impounding of Granny's medical supplies, to the real intentions of the elderly chemist.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts finally make it to their new castle and try to adjust to the English way of castle life, at the least the way Jethro thinks it is, based on his understanding of English myths and legends.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Jethro gets his draft notice, Jed decides he should pay what it costs the Army to train inductees. When Mr. Drysdale hears this, he starts figuring how he can get Jethro out on a Section 8.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro reports to the induction center after getting his draft notice. The Army isn't quite sure what to make of Jethro.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Since Granny can't plant crops in their yard, Jed thinks the solution is to buy her a plot a land somewhere else. He figures a place called Happy Acres is the best spot to buy land, not realizing it's a cemetery.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro thinks he wants to be a naval frogman, but Granny is concerned her tonic has transformed him. Mr. Drysdale, concerned about finances, has Miss Jane distract Jethro with comics, causing him to want to fly to the moon.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro heads down to the Reserves HQ while wearing an ancestor's Confederate Army uniform. The Sergeant thinks he's an actor there to participate in a Civil War reenactment. Jethro runs home to tell Granny the Civil War is still on.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Col. Blake asks the actor playing Gen. Grant to play along with Granny so that the Civil War movie can continue. Meanwhile, Jethro uses his 6th grade education to take the written test to enter the Reserves.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro believes his moment for Hollywood stardom has arrived. Casting for Bachelor Sheriff Knows Best is occurring, and Jethro mistakenly thinks he has been chosen.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny competes against Mrs. Drysdale as artists and tells Jed about her uncle, the barn painter. Jed and Jethro go to an upscale gallery to buy a painting, but are mistaken for gardeners. Bessie the chimp dabbles with a paintbrush.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After Ellie seems to be no longer interested in Dash Riprock Granny decides it's time to do a little matchmaking. She thinks the handsome actor would be perfect for Miss Jane.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale talks the Clampetts into hiring a housekeeper. Unfortunately, the housekeeper that is hired is uninterested in doing housework.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's old friend, the widow Adaline Ashley, comes to Beverly Hills, and Granny sets to playing matchmaker for her and Jed. Mrs. Drysdale and her snooty friends are misled to believe Adaline is a socialite jet-setter.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro decides to turn his favorite thing, eating, into a job by getting the family involved in buying a diner. The family's choice of offerings lead to a lack of customers, so Mr. Drysdale tries to fix things.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro, worried that his diner the Hungry Gizzard has no customers, has a wonderful idea. He busts in on Mr. Drysdale trying to impress the wealthy Vanderpools, announcing the restaurant is going topless. Confusion ensues.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny wants to leave sunny California because she misses winter, sending Mr. Drysdale into a panic. The banker enlists Miss Jane in an elaborate scheme to convince the Clampetts that a blizzard has occurred.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The last televised wrestling match was such a success that the promoter wants a rematch. Granny isn't interested until Rebecca's parents visit.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is worried about Miss Jane's spinsterhood and convinces Jethro to ask her to marry him. Granny assures him that she will decline the proposal, but Hathaway accepts, leading to panic in the Clampett household.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is on the warpath concerning the chaos caused by Ellie's critters and declares either they go or she does. Mr. Drysdale is equally irritated by the expense of his wife's poodle. Jed tries to find a solution.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny and Jethro believe they have psychic abilities, but Granny's predictions stop coming true. With her reputation on the line, she picks a stock for Mr. Drysdale that could cost him a small fortune.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Heading to England, Jethro smuggles Ellie's turkey buzzard on the plane upsetting Mr. Drysdale and a fellow passenger. After landing, they try to meet with the Queen to give her their 80 million dollars. Their butler Faversham tries to clear things up.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After the Clampetts return from London, Granny gets a letter from Hooterville asking her to help with Betty Jo Elliot's baby.

programme.title: Big Brother

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Set in 1950s Pittsburgh, the film adaptation of August Wilson’s Pulitzer Prize-winning play takes a passionate look at former baseball player Troy Maxson as he fights to provide for those he loves in a world that threatens to push him down.

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: The film chronicles the true story of Paul Rusesabinga (Don Cheadle), a brave hotel manager who risked his life and those of his family to take in more than 1,000 refugees during the 1994 genocide of the Tutsus by Hutu militia.

programme.title: Jimi: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: A drama based on Jimi Hendrix's life as he left New York City for London, where his career took off.

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Set in 1950s Pittsburgh, the film adaptation of August Wilson’s Pulitzer Prize-winning play takes a passionate look at former baseball player Troy Maxson as he fights to provide for those he loves in a world that threatens to push him down.

programme.title: Miles Ahead

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: Based on the best selling novel by T.D. Jakes, a couple's strength and faith are tested after the wife is injured in a car crash and her husband becomes attracted to another woman.

programme.title: Moesha

programme.title: Moesha

programme.title: Moesha
programme.desc: Moesha and Hakeem’s relationship hits a snag when Q returns to town; sparks fly between Moesha and Q; Q invites Moesha to spend the summer (as a road manager) on tour with his rap group.

programme.title: Moesha
programme.desc: Hakeem tries to convince Moesha to pass on Q’s offer to go on the road with his band, and focus on her priorities: school, family, and him. Moesha admits to being too distracted to make a clear decision.

programme.title: Roc

programme.title: Roc
programme.desc: To help her win a promotion at the hospital, Eleanor asks Andrew to romance the head nurse, Matty.

programme.title: Roc
programme.desc: While Joey tricks two famous jazz musicians into playing with him, Eleanor worries that Roc is getting too friendly with neighborhood vigilante Ronnie Paxton.

programme.title: Roc
programme.desc: When tests confirm a low sperm count, Roc Emerson asks his brother, Joey, to donate sperm so Eleanor can have a baby. Later, Roc changes his mind.

programme.title: Roc
programme.desc: Joey lies to keep Miles, the piano player in his jazz band, from finding out he is dating his ex-girlfriend but when Roc, involved in the sordid affair by Joey, confesses the truth the band breaks up.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Lamont gets a traffic ticket that he feels he does not deserve and Fred maneuvers himself into a position to be his son's lawyer, leaving Lamont in jeopardy.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Fred gets into a dispute with his neighbor Julio over the boundary dividing their properties. Lamont nags Fred to forget the whole matter but Fred doesn't let up until he hires a surveyor to settle the issue and determine the legal property line.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Lamont checks Fred into the hospital for tests to see why he has four or five heart attacks every day. To gain compassion from Lamont, Fred switches charts with his ailing roommate, who, unbeknownst to Fred, is scheduled for surgery.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Lamont and Rollo plan a romantic evening with two girls -- without Fred. Fred wants to help entertain the girls with lots of his onion stew and Ripple, but Lamont and Rollo insist the girls will prefer a French wine, chips and dips.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: The affections of a young lady become very painful for Lamont -- he gets punched in the nose by a 'big' rival. To help get his revenge, Lamont gives his all to karate lessons.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Grady gets involved in a case of mistaken identity with the amorous Betty Hairston who thinks she's engaged to him.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: The Jeffersons and the Willises are thrilled when they construe Jenny and Lionel's 'important news' to be an announcement that Jenny's pregnant, but all are devastated to find they've returned with shocking news of a very different nature.

programme.title: The Jeffersons

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: When Florence rescues George's assistant because he can't get a date to his senior prom, she has no idea what romantic trip down memory lane is in store for her.

programme.title: The Jeffersons
programme.desc: The Jefferson household rallies to help their friend Charlie-the-bartender face a crucial time in his life -- dealing with the denial of his drinking problem and his first step to recovery.

programme.title: The Jeffersons

programme.title: The Jeffersons

Plans made by Mary (Marla Gibbs) and Lester (Hal Williams) to celebrate their 20th wedding anniversary result in disharmony when quarreling in-laws come to town.

Guest star Pee Wee Herman plays himself in this special episode in which he, Mary (Marla Gibbs), Lester (Hal Williams) and Sandra (Jackée) are held captive in a toy store and must resort to more than pop guns and bows and arrows to set themselves free.

When Sandra (Jackée) cleans up her act and takes on a whole new identity for her visiting mother, special guest star Della Reese, she must split her personality to make another out-of-town guest, her 'HUNK DU JOUR,' happy as well.

When Sandra (Jackée) alerts the police that she suspects her current love interest Justin (Sam Scarber) has stolen more than her heart, the detectives set up surveillance headquarters in the home of Mary (Marla Gibbs) and Lester (Hal Williams).
Guest stars Red Buttons and Ron Glass appear in this unique 'Special Episode' of '227' which was videotaped only 24 hours prior to airing, enabling the characters to discuss late-breaking news items.

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: After a slip-sliding good time trying to win a bounty of coveted food, tensions run high when a couple of rednecks get into a fight over their booty.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: Tensions run high with the hut-bound rednecks as a tropical storm rips through the island, but a surprise visit from Steve for a game of Beer Pong helps calm their angst and fill their bellies with some much-wanted snack food.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: A redneck tea party gives everyone the opportunity to win treats from home, but the price of comfort proves too high for many.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The top 10 rednecks endure painful shocks to their systems in order to fill their deflated bellies. After a night of food-filled fun, the celebration comes to a screeching halt as one redneck drops the ball.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: As the population continues to shrink, the remaining stir-crazy rednecks set their sights on some basic needs. After aiming high, they head back to camp leaving much to be desired.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: An unexpected visit to Steve's place unveils a shocking twist that leaves the rednecks scrambling for answers. In an ass hauling competition, it is every man for himself as the rednecks' race to stay in the game.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: A pair of alliance-mates find themselves in a serious danger coming off of a surprise betrayal and look to improve their standing in the game.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The final five get down and dirty in order to win food items and make it one step closer to the $100,000 Grand Prize. Steve visits the camp and takes the Rednecks on a trip down "Memory Lane".

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The final four rednecks look forward to making a run for the hundred grand and are shocked to find one of them being eliminated in a good old-fashioned shoot out right before getting that chance.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Brian Boucher is passionate about three things: trucking, family, and racing. Brian's away from his wife and two kids for months at a time so the boys transform Brian's beat-down Volvo into a well-oiled machine fit for any racing fan!

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Josh Mullen is a musician who's doing everything he can to make it in the music business. As his band plays gigs all over the Midwest, the boys turn Josh's beat-down band van into a bodacious 1950s beach woody that'll be sure to turn heads on the road.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Lance Burk is the young owner of a feed delivery business and he really enjoys being his own boss. For the first time ever, the boys team up with Hollywood to transform Lance's old Kenworth into the Iron Man truck influenced by the blockbuster film.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Driving a truck is the only career David Goad has ever wanted and he considers it his job to help keep America's economy rolling. David's kids contact the boys and get them to turn David's worn-out Kenworth into a tribute to America's Old West.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Jay Whiteford's success in the trucking business is due to hard work and family support. Now, twenty-five years later, Jay's truck is on its last legs so the boys work to overhaul Jay's old Freightliner into a rolling tribute to Jay's career roots.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Derek Lepke has turned his passion for the outdoors into three very successful careers which operate out of his pickup truck. It's wearing down from overuse so the boys transform Derek's Ford F250 into a leopard-printed safari truck from down under!

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Rick Julian is the proud owner of a wrecking business and a volunteer with his local fire and police departments. The boys help give thanks to Rick by turning his beat-up Freightliner flatbed into a tribute to rescue vehicles.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: All Wade Hill really wants is a dependable truck he can be proud of so he can spend more time with his family. The boys turn Wade's run-down Pete 359 into a rolling tribute to Wade's favorite hobby: snowmobiling.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: David Tenpenny gave up his truck driving career in order to teach automotive mechanics in a small Kansas town, but driving never left his heart. David's class calls up the boys, who transform David's truck into a rolling educational workshop.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Marcos iba manejando y se percata que a su lado va una chica que se desnuda al conducir, él choca. Por otro lado, Jacobo es el principal sospechoso por la desaparición de su mujer y su hija.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Para demostrar que cualquier persona puede ser infiel, Melisa contrata a Victoria. Kalan, que vive como un homeless, le regala a su amigo Diego un local en NY a cambio de dejarlo dormir atrás.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Cuando nacieron Nataly y Liliana las intercambiaron en el hospital, ahora se pelean la herencia. También, Carlos y Karen se disputan la tutela de su hermano discapacitado, pero lo hacen por dinero.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Zaida sabe que su esposo es investigador privado, pero descubrió que se acostó con prostitutas. Por otro lado, la hija de Alexander dice que es reencarnada y reconoce a su familia.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Solanch y Marcelo tienen un albergue de transgéneros, Marcelo ahora quiere sacarlos. También, en un viaje de vacaciones, el mar arrastró a la sobrina de Miguel y murió, él tiene un trauma.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Juan Pablo fue alejado de su madre cuando tenía cuatro meses, años después la encuentra enferma. También, Raisa perdió una hija y adopta una niña que estaba en el sistema.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Paula demanda a José, porque su pitbull hirió al de ella durante una pelea. En otro caso, Kelly acusó de violación a Ray y sus amigos, pero no los encontraron culpables.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Pedro perdió sensibilidad en su pene cuando le hicieron la circuncisión, quiere que su hermano gemelo le done su miembro. Patricia salió embarazada de Marco, pero no ha elegido al mejor padre.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Con apenas dos años, la hija de Yanexis tiene sangrado menstrual y es rechazada en la guardería. Al salir de su país, Lourdes dejó a su hijo en manos del hombre que la maltrataba y torturaba.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Raúl cumplió injusta prisión por un crimen que no cometió, cobró indemnización y su ex reclama su parte. Además, Laura estudia audiovisuales y Ruby rompió su cámara por grabar un cortometraje.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Claudia sufrió un accidente con su familia y desde que salió del coma no recuerda quiénes son. En otro caso, Eva y su hija tienen cada cual una tienda de muñecas; a una sola le va bien.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Patricia es transexual y trabaja como actriz porno, pero no a cambio de dinero. Por otro lado, Rossi es una joven que tiene problemas de conducta y Gladis la secuestra para corregirla.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: Miguel y su hijo compusieron una canción, pero el joven creo una versión vulgar que afectó el prestigio de su padre. Además, Yissel aprendió 'kickboxing' y logró vengarse de su violador.

programme.title: Caso Cerrado
programme.desc: José desaparece y Carolina tiene que vender un riñón por algo de dinero. Por otro lado, Teresa descubre que Israel le es infiel y por venganza hace público su engaño con un cartel.

programme.title: Corona de Lagrimas
programme.desc: Refugio trabaja como contadora para poder mantener a sus tres hijos. Sin embargo, la vida de todos da un giro cuando uno de ellos es llevado a la cárcel y tienen que resolver sus propios problemas.

programme.title: Pistolas De Oro
programme.desc: Un hombre conocido como "Pistolas de Oro" tiene la costumbre de disparar a la gente en defensa propia. Cuando recibe un disparo, visita a un sacerdote que atiende sus heridas y le aconseja que cambie su vida.

programme.title: Pies de Gato
programme.desc: Luis Aguilar encabeza el elenco en esta historia de una banda de bandidos alegres cuyas hazañas son más divertidas que despreciables. Continuación de "Los bandidos de Río Frío" (1954).

programme.title: Toña Machetes
programme.desc: La determinación de Lorena por darle un giro a su vida y escapar de un entorno decadente, hará que encuentre en la actuación un camino que le ayudará a descubrir sus talentos y habilidades.

programme.title: Corona de Lagrimas
programme.desc: Refugio trabaja como contadora para poder mantener a sus tres hijos. Sin embargo, la vida de todos da un giro cuando uno de ellos es llevado a la cárcel y tienen que resolver sus propios problemas.

programme.title: Pistolas De Oro
programme.desc: Un hombre conocido como "Pistolas de Oro" tiene la costumbre de disparar a la gente en defensa propia. Cuando recibe un disparo, visita a un sacerdote que atiende sus heridas y le aconseja que cambie su vida.

programme.title: Pies de Gato
programme.desc: Luis Aguilar encabeza el elenco en esta historia de una banda de bandidos alegres cuyas hazañas son más divertidas que despreciables. Continuación de "Los bandidos de Río Frío" (1954).

programme.title: Pecado de juventud
programme.desc: Una sirvienta embarazada del joven de la casa donde trabaja es despedida de su trabajo y un vecino abogado le ofrece su ayuda para hacer que el joven se comprometa con ella, o al menos darle una ayuda para criar a su hijo.

programme.title: Cesar Chavez
programme.desc: Michael Peña interpreta a César Chávez, que inspiró a millones de estadounidenses a luchar por la justicia social. Su viaje triunfal es un testimonio del poder de un individuo para cambiar el mundo.

programme.title: La prueba
programme.desc: Los ganadores del Óscar Gwyneth Paltrow y Anthony Hopkins protagonizan la historia de una joven atormentada por el pasado de su padre y la sombra de su futuro. Basada en la obra ganadora del Pulitzer, Proof presenta a Jake Gyllenhaal y Hope Davis.

programme.title: Mente indomable
programme.desc: El exitoso drama ganador del Óscar, que lanzó las carreras de Matt Damon y Ben Affleck, cuenta la historia de un genio de clase obrera obstinado a quien no le va bien en la vida, hasta que conoce a un profesor de psicología cercano (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Cesar Chavez
programme.desc: Michael Peña interpreta a César Chávez, que inspiró a millones de estadounidenses a luchar por la justicia social. Su viaje triunfal es un testimonio del poder de un individuo para cambiar el mundo.

programme.title: Casa de arena y niebla
programme.desc: Massoud Amir Behrani usó gran parte de sus ahorros para mejorar las chances de encontrar un buen esposo para su hija. Tras lograr esto, destina los fondos restantes a la compra de una casa en una subasta, pero termina inmerso en una batalla legal.

programme.title: Mente indomable
programme.desc: El exitoso drama ganador del Óscar, que lanzó las carreras de Matt Damon y Ben Affleck, cuenta la historia de un genio de clase obrera obstinado a quien no le va bien en la vida, hasta que conoce a un profesor de psicología cercano (Robin Williams).

programme.title: I.Q: fórmula para amar
programme.desc: Todo el mundo sabe que Einstein es un genio científico. Pero ¿qué hay de Einstein el casamentero? I.Q. pone esta noción a prueba y logra resultados ganadores en esta "divertida y cálida comedia romántica" que aplauden críticos y público.

programme.title: Las Aparicio: La película
programme.desc: La exitosa serie “Las Aparicio” se traduce al cine y narra la historia de una familia de mujeres, pero; víctimas de una maldición, son viudas y no pueden concebir niños varones, por lo que deben unirse para resolver el secreto detrás de su viejo hogar.

programme.title: Corazón indomable
programme.desc: Una camarera apenas nota a un tímido ayudante de camarero que la ama en secreto; hasta que una noche la atacan y él viene a rescatarla. A partir de ahí, su relación se convierte en una de las historias de amor más inolvidables del cine.

programme.title: Cosas te tíos
programme.desc: Jason Lee interpreta a un ejecutivo en la ciudad de Seattle que se va a casar con la hija de su jefe (Selma Blair). Su vida se convierte en una pesadilla cuando no se acuerda si la engañó durante su despedida de soltero.

programme.title: I.Q: fórmula para amar
programme.desc: Todo el mundo sabe que Einstein es un genio científico. Pero ¿qué hay de Einstein el casamentero? I.Q. pone esta noción a prueba y logra resultados ganadores en esta "divertida y cálida comedia romántica" que aplauden críticos y público.

programme.title: Las Aparicio: La película
programme.desc: La exitosa serie “Las Aparicio” se traduce al cine y narra la historia de una familia de mujeres, pero; víctimas de una maldición, son viudas y no pueden concebir niños varones, por lo que deben unirse para resolver el secreto detrás de su viejo hogar.

programme.title: Como asesinar a una millonaria
programme.desc: Joan Rivers interpreta a la ama de casa de Beverly Hills, Irma Summers, quien está convencida de que su esposo planea matarla.

programme.title: Doble traición
programme.desc: Una semana antes de Navidad, y después de pasar seis años en prisión, un expresidiario se ve obligado a participar en un atraco al casino.

programme.title: Bent: Plan de venganza
programme.desc: En este mordaz thriller policíaco, un policía desacreditado que busca al asesino de su compañero descubre accidentalmente una conspiración gubernamental vinculada al asesinato de una mujer con un coche bomba.

programme.title: La vigilante del futuro
programme.desc: Major (Scarlett Johansson) es la primera de su clase: Una mente humana dentro de un cuerpo artificial. Al descubrir que sus creadores mintieron sobre su pasado para controlarla, no se detendrá hasta revelar su verdadera identidad y vengarse.

programme.title: Equilibrium

programme.title: El infierno
programme.desc: Benny ha sido deportado de los Estados Unidos a México, que está siendo destrozado por las guerras de los carteles de droga. Luego se involucra en el negocio del narcotráfico y comienza a subir de rango.

programme.title: No eres tú, soy yo
programme.desc: Después de la ruptura de su reciente matrimonio, Javier se encuentra en una depresión de la que ni siquiera un psiquiatra puede ayudarlo a salir. Sin embargo, la esperanza está en camino en la forma improbable de sus exnovias.

programme.title: Fuera del cielo
programme.desc: El drama de 24 horas comienza a las 6 de la mañana con el joven Cucú, cuyo hermano Malboro lo recibe después de una separación de cinco años. Una vez reunidos, planean un robo que los lleva a una serie de encuentros con diferentes personas.

programme.title: Stigmata

programme.desc: Desesperada por dinero fácil, la estudiante de segundo año Samantha Hughes (Jocelin Donahue) acepta trabajar como niñera en la apartada mansión de la extraña familia Ulman.

programme.desc: La pasión del matrimonio entre Henry y Nancy Clark desapareció hace mucho tiempo. Pero ahora su hijo menor ha abandonado el nido y los Clarks tienen la oportunidad de trasladarse a Nueva York.

programme.desc: Gregory Peck, Anthony Quinn and David Niven are Allied saboteurs assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa is reminded that she stored a birthday present for Oliver years ago: a genuine Stavinsky. But what is it? It's a modern art sculpture that is two parts plumbing pipes, one part tire chains, and one part birdbath. Oliver calls it The Thing.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The continually evolving story of how Lisa (Eva Gabor) and Oliver (Oliver) fell in love gets yet another version in this delightful episode. But one thing is for sure: Lisa and Oliver are just as in love today as the day when he fell out of the sky.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Green Acres is greener than ever…with jealousy. When Oliver (Eddie Albert) hires a handsome, young, intelligent Brit to take over his farm work while he is away, it doesn't take long for the newcomer to make a strong impression on Lisa (Eva Gabor).

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Mr. Haney is up to his money-making schemes again. When a government representative tells Mr. Haney that the state is looking to purchase the Douglas farm for a new highway, Mr. Haney arranges to buy back the farm from the Douglases at a steal.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Ralph, the lady carpenter, runs away from home and stays with the Douglases after having a fight with her brother, Alf. While Oliver may never get his bedroom finished, he gains a maid as Ralph takes over as the Douglases' live-in housekeeper.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Picking apples while on a picnic, Oliver runs into the feisty Ira Hatch, the owner of the apple orchard. However, once back in town, Mr. Drucker tells Oliver that Hatch has been dead for years. An incredulous Oliver agrees to see a psychologist.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer's acts of kindness towards his new waitress friend is mistaken for romantic interest by her cruel Marine Sergeant boyfriend.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Grandma Pyle visits Gomer, reads his fortune and predicts Gomer will cause something bad to happen; then Sergeant Carter loses his voice while yelling at him.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: A Colonel and his young daughter are visiting Camp Henderson. While befriending the little girl, Pyle has no problem getting her and himself in trouble with everyone.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Sgt. Carter is chosen to appear in a documentary but becomes an absurd camera hog, leaving producers no choice but to follow Gomer performing punishments Carter doles out.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: After a pay phone spits out $41.75 in coins, Duke and Frankie are ecstatic about all the fun they can have spending it, but good Samaritan Gomer is determined to return it to the phone company.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer wins a trip for two to Las Vegas and takes Sergeant Carter with him. The Sergeant has no money so he has to rely on Gomer for entertainment but Gomer has set an itinerary which include things like visiting a Rock Museum.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Opie Taylor runs away from Mayberry to join the Marines.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: LeBeau wants to escape, leaving Stalag 13 without its resident chef.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan first saves, then helps to escape, a German radio expert who the Germans want dead.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan convinces Klink that he is a great artist so that he can make a rendezvous in an art gallery.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Lord Chitterly, an English traitor who looks like the bumbling Colonel Crittendon, enters Stalag 13 with information for the Germans. Crittendon is made up to replace the Lord and fool the Germans.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Alex’s romantic instincts are triggered by the sexy voice at the answering service. Her alluring manner prompts him to arrange a dinner date that turns into a big surprise on Taxi.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: A pretty girl has John in a whirl, and his determination to meet her prompts the taxi gang to come up with a surefire line that would unfreeze any woman on earth in Taxi.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Elaine fears the worst when the cabbies invite themselves to her party for her highbrow art world friends who have no clue that she moonlights as a cab driver.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: The high-spirited taxi gang helps a jittery Bobby fight potential disappointment when he decides that he will end his stage career if he doesn’t get an acting job before midnight.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Mechanic Latka Gravas faces deportation unless he marries a U.S. citizen. The taxi gang comes to his rescue by pitching in and hiring a local working girl to be his bride.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: John and his new wife, Suzanne, reach a crisis point in their marriage when one of them must drop out of college due to financial woes.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Betty's cousin Foxey Dolan comes into town and sets her and Betty up for a night out on the town with a man she just met. He also happens to be on the run from crooks he's stolen from, and they'll kill to get their goods back.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: A shamed Japanese banker ritualistically kills himself, and McGarrett want to know why. McGarrett demands answers from a prominent financial consultant and the deceased's assistant when Five-O discovers the pair are involved in an international swindle.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarrett digs into a 33-year-old mystery when he links a Honolulu murder to a missing, anthropologically valuable human fossil that disappeared in China shortly before Pearl Harbor.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarrett's investigation of a murder is thwarted by a computer which has been fed with erroneous information in hopes of diverting the guilt for the crime away from the guilty party.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Three troubled women take up armed robbery aboard scenic tour buses as a moneymaking project. The three women: Dina Hale, a lady with a hidden habit; Fay Scott, the mother of a desperately ill child; Margaret Hudson, an unhappily married housewife.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: When Five-O nabs a shantytown ragamuffin for a minor theft, it sparks friction between McGarrett and a dedicated but impetuous female deputy public defender. The interference snags McGarrett's attempt to hide and protect the child from a hired killer.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: In this follow-up to 'Even Nice People,' Gillespie’s daughter, Lana Farran, continues to defend her home from her mother’s greedy ex-boyfriend Carl DeLissa and the mob who are willing to go to great lengths to acquire and develop it, even murder.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Harriet DeLong’s son Eugene teams up with a prison pastor, Bishop William Prinn, to get his father, Vic Glendon, off death row, but when Prinn is traveling to Sparta, he finds his life is in danger when his car is run off the highway by a stranger.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: The town council decides not to renew Bill Gillespie’s contract, pushing him into a sudden retirement. As the new Sparta police chief, Hampton Forbes, arrives from Memphis, a young boy emulates the violence he sees on television and shoots a man.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Bill Gillespie and Hampton Forbes begin their new roles as Sheriff of Newman County and Sparta Chief of Police and must immediately team up to solve a triple murder involving a young man with an intellectual disability. Wayne Brady guest stars.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: After a robbery and tragic triple murder, one thief is missing, one is dead and a terrified young man with an intellectual disability, Henry Ulmer, is on the run. As the police search for Henry, Gillespie and Forbes work together to solve the case.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: Larry Wilson is a motorcycle cop who doesn't always use procedure. Instead he zeros on the point and rushes to it sometimes lacking caution. Stone is frustrated by the rambunctious officer, who happens also to be dating his daughter.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: After receiving crank calls, a paranoid man fences in his home and keeps his wife and daughter sheltered. When he panics and shoots a cop who was guarding the house he covers by identifying an ex con. The paranoia now becomes real.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco
programme.desc: A former sex worker works undercover for Stone and Robbins by going back to work for the pimp who is responsible for the death of her friend and a police detective.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Richard Kimble finds an escaped prisoner who is dangerously ill claiming to be innocent and determined to gun down the man he blames for framing him.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Richard Kimble dates a waitress whose nephew's buddies plan to capture him with a mail-order rifle.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Richard Kimble knows negligence caused the death of a salvage diver and he jeopardizes his own life when he befriends the girl accused of being a jinx.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Kwai Chang Caine (DAVID CARRADINE) assists blind preacher Serenity Johnson (JOHN CARRADINE) to swindle the most dangerous man in Arizona.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Kwai Chang Caine (DAVID CARRADINE) comes to the aid of a Black family and a white family whose sons are kidnapped by a renegade Confederate Army officer.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: David Carradine stars as a Buddhist monk and hunted man who wanders the American West in the 1870s fighting intolerance and injustice with his mastery of an ancient form of high combat known as Kung Fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu
programme.desc: Kwai Chang Caine (David Carradine), the half-American Buddhist monk from China, wandering the American West as a wanted fugitive, befriends a boy without housing, foils a bounty hunter, and experiences the pain of love.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A plane lands safely, but the pilot, crew and all of its passengers are missing!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a nuclear attack appears imminent, several suburban friends and neighbors fight over control of a single bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On the road home from the Civil War, a Confederate soldier stops at a burned-out house and gets to know the owner, a recent widow.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After a poor but ambitious Central American farm worker overthrows his country's tyrannical leader, he believes he sees assassins everywhere. A look in the mirror reveals his most dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Before he died, notorious gunslinger Pinto Sykes put a curse on hired-gun Conny Miller. Miller returns to town and is challenged to visit the grave of Sykes, despite the curse.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Little Anthony Fremont controls an entire town with his ability to read minds and make people do as he wishes.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A former Nazi SS Captain returns to the ruins of a concentration camp to reminisce and is met by one of his victims.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Earth's orbit has been changed, drawing ever closer to the sun and promising imminent destruction.

programme.title: The Outer Limits: 1963
programme.desc: For Andy Thorne (Eddie Albert) and his wife, Karen (June Havoc), an innocent drive into the countryside turns into a living nightmare when they become trapped in a remote canyon ruled by a strange alien force with which they cannot communicate.

programme.title: The Outer Limits: 1963
programme.desc: When a rescue mission is sent to Mars to discover the fate of a doomed expedition, the Commander (Adam West) and his crew find themselves hunted by an invisible enemy who seems intent on picking them off...one at a time. Ted Knight co-stars.

programme.title: The Best Of Flip Wilson

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una pequeña niña se enfermó y murió, los investigadores se vieron sorprendidos. ¿Fue un accidente, una enfermedad inexplicable o un asesinato?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando un policía fuera de servicio murió de un disparo, sus colegas oficiales estaban determinados a resolver el crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de una Convención de Filadelfia, 180 legionarios contraen síntomas similares a la neumonía y 29 de ellos mueren. La determinación de un científico ayuda a identificar la causa de esta enfermedad mortal.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La investigación de un pediatra, provocada por la misteriosa muerte de uno de sus pacientes, conduce a un hospital de Texas donde la tasa de mortalidad pediátrica es más alta que en cualquier hospital del país.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de que una pelea callejera le quitó la vida a un campeón nacional de lucha libre, la policía tuvo que determinar si fue asesinado a sangre fría o en defensa propia.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran muerta a la esposa de un dentista bien conocido, la policía se esfuerza por identificar a un sospechoso. Algunas fibras y un estudio de los patrones climáticos en la noche del asesinato abren el caso y revelan al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un joven sano muere misteriosamente mientras duerme y las pruebas de toxicología revelan una dosis letal de lidocaína en su sangre.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando un miembro adinerado de la sociedad muere después de caer de las escaleras, los testimonios de los testigos contradicen la evidencia.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el año 2000, el cuerpo de la bailarina exótica Rachel Siani fue encontrado debajo de un puente de Nueva Jersey. Los investigadores se preguntaron si se había suicidado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando dos mujeres desaparecieron y luego fueron encontradas brutalmente asesinadas, la policía se preguntó si fueron víctimas de un crimen de odio.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La investigación de un choque mortal en 1983 causado por el equipo de seguridad de la reina de Inglaterra durante una visita a California.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Sin oraciones
programme.desc: La fundadora de American Atheists desapareció en 1995 junto con uno de sus hijos y su nieta, junto con 500,000 dólares en monedas de oro. La policía se centró en varios sospechosos, incluyendo a David R. Waters, que trabajaba para los Ateos Americanos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una joven mujer asiste a los servicios religiosos de la tarde y luego desaparece. Cuando se encuentra su automóvil abandonado, el tanque está vacío y falta una lata de gasolina que tenía en su baúl para emergencias.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se encontró a Janice Johnson muerta al pie de las escaleras del sótano. La policía de Nueva Escocia tuvo que desenredar las circunstancias que rodearon la muerte de Janice y responder a la pregunta: ¿Fue un accidente o un asesinato?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1993, Kathryn Bishop de 82 años es encontrada muerta en su hogar de Pennsylvania. Pequeñas pistas en el cuerpo de la víctima le dirán a la policía lo que pasó esa noche.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: De fotografía

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The ladies are really challenged when guest choreographer DJ Guthrie teaches them a new dance style. Kelli and Judy have some tough decisions to make about who will remain on the squad.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The training camp candidates hold their breath as the one and only Kitty Carter pays a visit to training camp. Kitty takes no prisoners as she rips into the new girls as well as the vets.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With their futures on the line, the training camp candidates try to push through their heightened emotions to show Kelli and Judy they deserve to be part of America's Sweethearts. Unfortunately, for some "Tonight will be your last night".

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: This is it, the last chance, as the girls finally learn their fate. Dreams start coming true as the girls pose for Squad Photo. There is some great dancing as Show Group and the rest of the squad perform for the first time at a new "Meet The Team" event.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Begin the journey to see who will survive the most demanding dance audition in professional sports. 500 ladies put their dreams on the line as they try to become a famed Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader, for the 2014-2015 season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The final day of training camp has everyone nervous because Kelli and Judy might take a squad of less than 36.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Degrassi has a new hottie in Grade 9 and Manny’s got her eye on him. Especially since her “boyfriend” Spinner can’t even be bothered to take a night off work to come to the Cupid Dance she’s organized.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Something’s wrong with Emma. Though she’s frustrated at being treated with kid gloves by everyone since the school shooting, she’s not sure how she’d rather be treated. So she just keeps going on, numbly reassuring everyone that she’s fine.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma steps into the lead role in Dracula, but her recent extra-curricular activities with Jay prove even more dramatic.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner has difficulty dealing with the return of injured Jimmy. He hasn’t talked to him since the shooting, and his guilt over what he did leaves him unable to welcome Jimmy back to school.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ellie is finding it hard to make ends meet now that she’s living on her own and hates relying on her mother for rent, especially with its obligatory dinners to pick up the cheque.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige and Matt are totally in love, so what if they have to keep it secret? It’s worth all the extra effort.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With school coming to a close, Marco is making huge plans for his summer with Dylan – and their future. He’s considering fast-tracking to graduate high school, joining Dylan in university a year earlier.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After dutifully picking up the Spirit Squad slack for a love-struck Paige all year, Manny feels betrayed when Paige claims all the glory. So Manny plots her revenge with a complicated cheer that leaves Paige with a broken leg on Prom Night.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Ashley’s leaving for the summer, and the idea of their temporary farewell and the stress of writing a song for Kevin Smith’s movie -- is making him, well, nuts. So Craig decides to do whatever it takes to follow her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Frustrated by everything around him, Craig runs away. As he wanders the street, he befriends a young busker nicknamed, “Skinny”.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Paige and Spinner awkwardly discuss last night's surprising kiss-fest, Darcy interrupts. She regrets their fight and breakup. But Spinner tells her he meant what he said – if Darcy can’t accept him, past and all, they're through.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Another year at Degrassi kicks off and Manny decides she’s going to be a serious actress, whatever it takes.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige has got her whole life mapped out. She plans on being accepted into the marketing program at the best university in Canada.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: JT has got his license. He’s got a steady girlfriend in Liberty, who happens to be Student Council President. So why is he feeling anything but a “man”? Because Liberty’s in control.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After all the craziness of last year, Craig has one overriding goal: no drama. He’s focused on his friends, his family, his studies, and his band – a reconstituted Downtown Sasquatch but no Spinner - a new addition is rocking the drum-kit…

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After proving he’s still got talent on the hardwood, Jimmy is invited to try out for the Wheelchair Basketball Association’s Junior Team. It’s Jimmy’s second chance at athletic stardom, and an opportunity to make his father proud.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Liberty’s pregnancy enters its sixth month, she and JT are forced to face reality: even though no longer a couple, they have to deal with the pregnancy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Desperate for cash, JT has stolen drugs from the pharmacy… He becomes entangled in a web between his boss, the drug dealer, and the police.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Someone’s definitely interested in Marco. But as it turns out, Tim is interested in Marco, but not for the expected reason. Tim knows Marco is gay, and has been struggling with how to come out to his friends and family.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The one-year anniversary of the school shooting is approaching and everyone’s feeling the weight of it. Not least of whom is Spinner Mason, still persona non grata.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
