programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Since being "saved" everything has been going Spinner's way: he's made a good friend in Friendship Club leader Linus; his relationship with Darcy has been going strong, and his recent interest in improving school life has been getting him noticed.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Simpson-Nelson household is in chaos. With Snake gone and Spike totally down in the dumps, keeping the household together has fallen totally onto Emma’s shoulders.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: The green slime oozing from the drill head is transforming men into monsters. Stahlman refuses to listen to the warnings and resorts to sabotage so that his project may continue.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: Transported to a parallel world, the Doctor discovers that England is under military rule and the drilling project is at a more advanced stage.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno

programme.desc: Churchill is usually a well-mannered dog, but around other animals he's a monster, and lovable pit bull Maya can be a handful.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar takes the spoiled Bubba down a notch; discover why German shepherd Garret never stops chasing his tail.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Emily, the pit bull, is sent to doggie boot camp because she is so quick to attack other dogs that her owners can no longer walk her.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold, it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan, so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk holds the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince the family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job, and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: New series focusing on the tumultuous home and professional life of bounty hunter Dwayne "Dog" Chapman, and his partner and wife Beth. In the first episode, Dog and team chase Floyd Chapman (no relation), a heavily tattooed bail jumper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In Hawaii, Dog sets off from Honolulu to Kona to help his son Leland with some of his fugitives. First, a stop at Leland's boxing gym to warm up for their day of hunting with a quick sparring session and some father-and-son time together.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to liven things up with a competition. He and Beth will hunt for one fugitive, while Leland and Justin chase another. The winner will be the duo that captures its fugitive first. Will Dog keep bragging rights as the Best Bounty Hunter in

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once a criminal himself, Dog knows how it feels to be hunted. In this episode, Dog and the team delve into the depths of Honolulu's Chinatown as they search for a young Samoan girl who's gone down the wrong path. After a frustrating day of hunting, D

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: While hunting an elusive deep sea fisherman, Dog is also trying to plan a great Mother's Day for Beth, but he's having problems finding the special flowers Beth wants.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is hunting a man known as The Godfather of Waikiki. Dog and Beth bailed him out as a courtesy, but now he is refusing to go to court. If Dog doesn't bring him in, it could cost him more than money; he may lose his respect on the street.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has a big problem. Patty Estabilio has jumped a $15,000 bail bond and disappeared into Hawaii's underworld. Kissing the kids good night, Dog and Beth, with Tim and Leland at their side, plunge into a drug-infused netherworld.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Justin is the low man on the totem pole in the Chapman clan, and this means that the rest of the team is always teasing him. But Justin wants to be a full-fledged member of the team, and Dog has a fugitive that will be his test case.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team return to their roots, with a visit to their home town of Denver. Dog and Tim begin the day with an early morning radio show appearance, and it pays off when a listener calls in with a tip about one of the fugitives they're hunting.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Denver Dog discovers that recapturing the past can be more difficult then tracking down felons. On a day of more misses then hits in their fugitive hunting, Dog and Beth repeatedly collide with reminders of their early days.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog hunts down Chris, a fugitive wanted on drug charges. Dog turns over every rock, but to no avail. Later, they decides to revoke the bonds they holds on Chris's mother and stepfather because they've violated the conditions of their own bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion, the team tails the truck in two SUVs, regularly switching the follow car to throw off their scent.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to sweep the island clean of as many fugitives as he can in two days. Raymond, wanted on drug charges, is an easy grab. Mauro, wanted for solicitation, is busted. And a Samoan, Siamau, is convinced to fly back to Hawaii from L.A.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after a fugitive named Tracy who lives in a homeless shelter, but the shelter's staff is uncooperative, and the two sides get into an angry confrontation that forces Dog to temporarily back off.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog juggles his job and family responsibilities at the same time. He leads the search for Robert, a low-level drug dealer. As he hunts down Robert, Dog gets on the phone to tell Beth not to spend too much money to furnish Leland's Honolulu apartment.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Upset because one his puppies may die and wanting to give the little guy a second chance in life, Dog decides to offer one of the fugitives a second chance, too. He captures Paul, a meth addict, then steers him to a rehab program instead of jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.title: Rescue Vet

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Matt and David meet equine rock star Jon Bon Pony. Peter treats a farmer's trusty Labrador who's struggling to walk after cutting herself on a nail. Julian operates on a chicken with an infected leg. Robin aids a pregnant ewe.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: In this episode, Peter is mystified by the contents of Khufu the cat’s stomach after his owner is concerned that he has totally lost his appetite. Peter performs surgery on the cat but when he opens its stomach, he gets the shock of his life!

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People

programme.title: Pet Heroes

programme.desc: Peter rushes to save a newborn calf who's going downhill fast. Julian visits Tazmin the huge eagle. Peter’s old friend, Bison, the much-loved boxer, has hormone problems. Can Julian get a poorly ewe well enough to have lambs?

programme.desc: Alicia queda alterada cuando Perfecta llega a reprocharle en la recepción del hotel por tener a los niños escondidos. Sebastián se molesta con su madre por no avisarle lo que sucede.

programme.title: Marido en alquiler
programme.desc: Patricia busca a Antonio en la posada para decirle adiós y él la besa. Kikito encuentra el boleto de lotería y se lo da a Kike. Griselda sufre por haber echado a Antonio de la casa pero encuentra consuelo en Reinaldo, que le da un fuerte abrazo.

programme.title: Marido en alquiler
programme.desc: Beatriz le confiesa a Alba que quiere tener un hijo de Guillermo a través de su esperma donado a la Clínica de Fertilización. Manuel vuelve en sí y le agradece a Celeste por salvarle la vida. Patricia encuentra a su padre abrazando a Griselda.

programme.title: Marido en alquiler
programme.desc: En su última noche en el restaurante, Griselda le pide a Reinaldo que no se vean más pero la atracción mutua solo aumenta. Gabriel sorprende a Kike y a Clara besándose en la cocina. Máximo le confiesa a Bárbara que no se está sintiendo bien.

programme.title: Marido en alquiler
programme.desc: Teresa Cristina y Reinaldo harán una fiesta para renovar sus votos y Antonio se la juega por reconquistar a Patricia. Hay gran expectativa por la pelea entre los boxeadores Máximo y Murillo. Juan Pablo finalmente habla con Esther sobre la paternidad.

programme.title: Una maid en Manhattan
programme.desc: Catalina le propone a Cristóbal un acuerdo a cambio de no hacer pública la entrevista a Yaya, Tito está a favor de negociar. Sara quiere saber cómo la periodista se enteró de la intriga que ella montó. Belinda recibe un anónimo que la desconcierta.

programme.title: Una maid en Manhattan
programme.desc: Amelia ahoga las penas bebiendo y Marisa conforta a Ty en su tristeza. Ella escucha una conversación que hace dudar de las intenciones de Sara con los Parker. Tania presiona a Jerome para saber en qué se mete. Carmen busca tocar el corazón de Yaya.

programme.title: Una maid en Manhattan
programme.desc: Marisa promete encontrar las pruebas de las intrigas de Sara contra la familia Parker, Cristóbal se niega a creer que sea una persona tan maligna. Thompson en persona amenaza a Ty con un escándalo. Se adelantan los planes de mejoramiento del barrio.

programme.title: Una maid en Manhattan
programme.desc: Inicia la batalla por la custodia de Lalo y Marisa se muere de miedo de perderlo. Los Parker dan una entrevista en la que se venden como la pareja perfecta. Marcela comienza a trabajar en el Cali Café; Calixta le advierte de las normas de discreción.

programme.title: La viuda de blanco
programme.desc: Los gemelos llegan al hotel para contarle a Alicia lo que sucede en el colegio. Hayde se descontrola, pasa por un momento terrible en el bar en medio de una de sus presentaciones.

programme.title: La viuda de blanco
programme.desc: Sebastián le habla claro a Perfecta cuando ella le toca el tema del matrimonio, ella solo piensa en una mujer para él. Justino le prohíbe los encuentros clandestinos a Alicia.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant walks the wing of a bi-plane in flight. We fill a plexiglass basin with water, plums, ribbon and garter snakes, and one big albino snake. To jump a car off a two level parking structure with the furthest distance.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants must ride a bull for eight seconds. Each contestant eats poached cow's brain, served cold. To go the furthest distance after being ratcheted up and rope swinging down.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To jump from one moving boat to another. Climb into fishing boat tank filled with dead squid and retrieve weights from the bottom. Contestants shimmy out on a flag pole that is approximately 20 feet from the building, free the flag and shimmy back.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Players climb out over the skid and underneath the helicopter. Contestants shoot at target, determining the number of boiled pig rectums they will have to eat. The contestant must navigate around the ledge of a tall building.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Playmates Super Bowl Special Part 2

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Player climbs out of a blimp and onto a rope ladder. Contestants bob in plexiglass box of waxworms. To drive a car into a roll.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Climb a rope ladder into a helicopter. To eat the blended concoction you are given. To move flags from the first to the last pole.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To run through a vertical obstacle course. Contestants will put their head inside the box with 24 rats. To cross a plank suspend between to speeding semi-trucks.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Celebrity 2. To move flags from one open window across and around the outside of a building. To separate and move white snakes out of a group of green. To escape from a submerged cage and swim to a life ring.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants enter the water where there is a 30-yard long tunnel. Unhatched duck's embryo boiled 30 minutes and then served. Contestants must ride a bicycle across a 10" wide plank that is suspended between two buildings.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To jump from moving helicopter onto a floating platform. Place 60 pink toed tarantulas into torture hat and stay still for 3 minutes. The contestant lies in a plexi-glass tube as water is pumped in.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To stand naked in public. Contestants have to eat 0-5 live Madagascar hissing cockroaches. Players are wrapped in heavy chain around their ankles and submerged into a tank of water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To gather as many flags as possible. To play a game of pool and eat the assigned items. To run across shipping containers planting flags.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: To jump from one roof to the other roof. To search for and eat coagulated blood balls hidden in earthworms. To escape from a submerged fuselage.

programme.desc: Acclaimed by critics and loved by audiences around the world, Jet Li, Maggie Cheung, and Donnie Yen star in this Oscar and Golden Globe-nominated action-packed epic, in which a fearless warrior rises up to defy an empire and unite a nation.

programme.title: Flying Swords Of Dragon Gate
programme.desc: A Ming Dynasty freedom fighter (Jet Li), a female warrior (Zhou Xun) and a corrupt eunuch (Kun Chen) are among those who converge on a remote desert hostel that sits atop a city of treasures.

programme.title: The Flying Swordsman
programme.desc: Hu Fei, the son of the sword master Hu YiDao, has to avenge his father's death to eight evil men.

programme.title: Rising Shaolin: The Protector
programme.desc: Debao, framed for murder, finds refuge with a Shaolin monk who trains him in martial arts and empathy, shaping his path to redemption.

programme.title: Shaolin
programme.desc: After ambushing and killing his rival, losing everything in the process, dispirited warlord Hou Jie turns to a Shaolin monastery seeking salvation.

programme.title: Iron Monkey
programme.desc: Presented by Quentin Tarantino, Iron Monkey is the spirited tale of a mysterious and mythical Chinese legend in this exhilarating non-stop martial arts excitement.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares en español
programme.desc: Cuando el Chef Ramsay regresa a Finn McCool's, The Olde Stone Mill, The Mixing Bowl, Dillon's, Campania's y Peter's, encuentra restaurantes salvados del borde del desastre.

programme.title: A bocados: Episodio 28
programme.desc: Receta: lasaña vegetal. Explotación hortícola de Iñigo Garin y su hijo Amets en Kortezubi. Vende su producto a través de cestas que los clientes reciben semanalmente en casa.

programme.title: A bocados: Episodio 29
programme.desc: Receta: salmonete con pure y pure de coliflor y romanesco. Jonathan, Arrantzale de Lekeitio y propietario del barco "Jesús de Nazareth Berria", explica cómo pescan, en esta ocasión, salmonetes.

programme.title: A bocados: Episodio 30
programme.desc: Receta: cordero al chilindrón. Javier Mondoate pastor de Carranza. Amelia Ensartado y secado de pimientos en Lodosa. Truco o reto: azúcar en las verduras.

programme.title: A bocados: Episodio 31
programme.desc: Receta: hamburguesa de pollo con boniato asado. Supermercado Superbaratze, en Donostia a cargo de Suhair Elbukili especializado en productos de todo el mundo.

programme.title: Torres en la cocina
programme.desc: Champiñones Con Langostinos, Pollo a la Perea

programme.title: Torres en la cocina
programme.desc: Cabrito a la Sidra, Tronco de Navidad de Turrón

programme.title: Torres en la cocina
programme.desc: Percebes Torres, Cochinillo Crujiente (navidad)

programme.title: Torres en la cocina
programme.desc: Capón Relleno, Tortas de Recao (navidad)

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares en español
programme.desc: Sebastian's prepara comida congelada de un menú complejo y los meseros están más preocupados por las audiciones para sus papeles de actuación que por servir las comidas.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares en español
programme.desc: El chef Ramsay visita el Finn McCool's manejado por una familia en Westhampton, Nueva York, y se enfrenta a un detestable jefe de cocina que resulta ser el hijo del propietario.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares en español
programme.desc: Ubicado en Bellmore, Nueva York, The Mixing Bowl enfrenta una afluencia de competencia y apenas tiene clientes.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares en español
programme.desc: El chef Ramsay debe trabajar con un chef testarudo y propietarios sin experiencia para realizar algunos cambios y traer de vuelta a los clientes a Seascape.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares en español
programme.desc: El chef Ramsay se dirige a Fair Lawn, Nueva Jersey, para encontrarse con un personal de meseros indiferentes que lastima al restaurante italiano Campania's.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares en español
programme.desc: El chef Ramsay visita Peter's, un restaurante italiano familiar en Babylon, Nueva York. Descubre que el restaurante se está hundiendo debido a su descarado gerente y copropietario.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A two-man shrimp boat sinks when a fast-moving, violent storm strikes the Louisiana coast. The captain drowns, but the deckhand is rescued fourteen hours later. The crewman is hailed as a hero — until the captain's body is discovered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was supposed to be a routine motorcade for the Queen of England. But on the way to Yosemite National Park, a car carrying three Secret Service agents collided with a car driven by a deputy from the local sheriff's office.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In rural Canada, Dr. John Schneeberger is accused of sedating and sexually assaulting one of his female patients and his step daughter. DNA tests demonstrate that the doctor is innocent, but the patient insists that he sedated and raped her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: How unlucky could one man be? His college sweetheart killed herself and fourteen years later, his wife ended her life in a similar way. Investigators had to determine if this was murder or simply a bizarre coincidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim had been stabbed more than thirty times and the crime scene was awash with her blood. Near her head, police discovered a distinctive button with strands of thread still attached.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, when the wife of a serviceman was brutally murdered in the Philippines, investigators had to reassemble a tiny computer disk that had been cut to pieces in order to find the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tracey Frame, 35, was convicted of killing David Nixon in April 2002 after he planned to end their relationship.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A serial arsonist starts several fires that cause millions of dollars worth of damage and the deaths of three people. He is discovered, partly through the use of forensic hypnosis.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Susie Mowbray was charged in her husband's death. Her son was so convinced of her innocence that he enrolled in law school, studied all of the evidence and, eventually, discovered the truth of what really happened between his parents.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, California firefighters battled ten arson fires in three weeks. When cigarettes and a scrap of paper connected the case to similar fires further north, the hunt was on for a dangerous pyromaniac.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the 1980s, a trio of unsolved murders occurred in Wichita Falls, Texas. Later, a fourth murder from the same time period provided the police with far more than they realized.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In this classic episode of Forensic Files, the longest-running true crime series in television history, a serial bomber targets a judge, two attorneys and even a courthouse.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A college senior was found raped and murdered near an unpaved footpath used by students to walk from one side of campus to the other.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors cannot pinpoint the source of a businessman's illness.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Avis Banks and her unborn child were brutally murdered. The body was discovered by her fiancé, Keyon Pittman. When police learned that Pittman was having affairs with other women, he became the prime suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a dry cleaner employee is raped and murdered in her store, police turn to forensic science for the answers they need.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2004, Rebecca Barney and her soon-to-be ex-husband Fred were found shot to death in their Tulsa, Oklahoma, home, which had been set on fire.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2006, Texas real estate agent Sarah Anne Walker was found brutally murdered in a model home. Weeks later, a witness came forward who may have seen the killer. Police used forensic hypnosis to help him recall every detail of the man's appearance.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve 2005, a man's body is found burning near Baltimore. He's eventually identified as 26-year-old Wesley Person. Distinctive building materials from the 1930s play a crucial role in solving this case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2003, Kathy Lorick was murdered on a Concord, California jogging trail while talking to her husband on her mobile phone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1988, when a patient dies unexpectedly in the office of California neurologist Richard Boggs, police begin what they think will be a routine investigation. Soon they uncover a bizarre story of corpse stealing, fake identity and sexual perversion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are led on a wild goose chase when the wife of a prominent banker is kidnapped. An entomologist's unexpected discovery leads to a new suspect — and the realization that ordinary office equipment can leave extraordinary clues.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, Palm Beach waitress Denise O'Neill is abducted and murdered. Her neighbor Luis Caballero arouses suspicions by behaving oddly toward TV crews covering the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Virginia Beach police arrive at the Makdessi apartment to find the bloodied bodies of Elise Makdessi and Navy sailor Quincy Brown. But was Brown Elise's lover or her assailant?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: By using techniques she saw on forensic science TV shows, a mother determines who was responsible for the accident that permanently injured her 4-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1992, 22-year-old Dawn Bruce is brutally murdered in her Virginia apartment. Investigators notice a blood smear on a pillow case that appears to have been made by one of the killer's fingers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young girl was found dead, police quickly arrested the most likely suspect. But cutting-edge technology from NASA enabled a forensic odontologist to prove the wrong man was behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files (embed)
programme.desc: After a Philadelphia Convention, 180 Legionnaires contract pneumonia-like symptoms and 29 of them die. The determination of one scientist helps identify the cause of this deadly disease.

programme.title: Forensic Files (embed)
programme.desc: On September 17, 1984, in a suburb of Tucson, Arizona, eight-year-old Vicki Hoskins left home on her pink bicycle to mail a letter for her mother. She never returned, but her slightly damaged bicycle was found nearby.

programme.title: Forensic Files (embed)
programme.desc: While skeet shooting on a beautiful spring day, Martin Dillon is shot dead. His friend maintains it was a freak accident, but it takes more than 20 years for the truth to surface.

programme.title: Forensic Files (embed)
programme.desc: In 1996, police received a call from Darlie Routier telling them of her two sons' murders. The police found the killer by analyzing blood spatter, doing behavioral profiling and analyzing Darlie's 911 call.

programme.title: Forensic Files (embed)
programme.desc: When Joann Katrinak is found dead in a corn field with her infant son, the obvious suspect is the husband and father of the victims. But insects found on the bodies reveal a vital clue which uncovers a twisted story of passion gone wrong.

programme.title: Forensic Files (embed)

programme.desc: Los cuatro chefs restantes reciben quince minutos y una bandeja con sobras para crear una comida que el chef Ramsay considera servible.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día nueve
programme.desc: El chef Ramsay ordena a los tres concursantes restantes que sirvan una cena completa. ¿Quién creará el mejor plato y quién será enviado a casa sin postre?

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez
programme.desc: En el final de temporada, los dos finalistas, con la ayuda de los chefs eliminados, compiten en una simulación que pone a prueba sus habilidades para administrar un restaurante.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día uno
programme.desc: En este estreno de temporada de dos horas, doce chefs comienzan su viaje hacia el premio final: un puesto de chef ejecutivo en el recientemente inaugurado Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa en Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día dos
programme.desc: Después de una desastrosa noche de apertura, ambos equipos aprenden la importancia del servicio en un restaurante: servir mesas.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día tres
programme.desc: Frustrado después de otro mediocre servicio en la cena, el chef Ramsay comparte algunas de sus experiencias dirigiendo un exitoso restaurante mientras prepara la competencia de la tercera noche.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día cuatro
programme.desc: El chef Ramsay pone fin a la batalla de los sexos y "Hell's Kitchen" abre nuevos caminos cuando los equipos cocinan para un grupo especialmente exigente: los niños.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día cinco
programme.desc: El quinto día comienza con el chef Ramsay dando una lección a los concursantes restantes sobre el arte del sabor culinario.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día seis
programme.desc: Los seis chefs restantes preparan sus platos originales, y los dos equipos diseñan sus menús para la cena de la noche.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Dia siete
programme.desc: Los chefs deben trabajar como equipo por primera vez. El premio de este desafío es un viaje con el chef Ramsay al Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa.

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: When Jett delivers a toy vacuum cleaner to a boy in Switzerland, Donnie modifies it to be "bigger and better". But the new vacuum is too powerful and gets away.

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: A young girl named Tess is excited to go to Schiphol Airport in her hometown of Amsterdam, where she will be going on her first airplane ride; Jett brings her a carry-on suitcase, but trouble arises when it goes missing.

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chloé's Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.desc: Dad and Lincoln get on "Legends of the Hidden Temple" and cannot wait to for a whole day of father-and-son bonding; Lincoln wants to go to the mall but has to watch his younger sisters, so he decides to take them to the mall.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: During a road trip to their vacation destination, everything that can go wrong for the family does.

programme.desc: Torn between her work friends and her school friends, Leni tries to bring everyone together; when Lincoln and Clyde go to tour the middle school, Lynn gives them some questionable advice.

programme.desc: When Lucy quits the writing club at school due to the by-the-book way Huggins runs the club, Mom takes over; Luna and Sam embark on a challenge taking place across Royal Woods and discover they have less in common than they thought.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan tries out for the school play to get closer to her crush, Benny; when Clyde and schoolmate Zach begin bonding over a mutual interest in antiques, Lincoln quickly finds himself feeling like a third wheel.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne makes friends with Sid, a girl whose family wants to rent the apartment upstairs; when it looks like another couple might get it first, the girls resort to sabotage to try and dissuade them.

programme.desc: When a high utility bill threatens Hector and Rosa's annual trip, Ronnie Anne spearheads an effort to lower usage; desperate for their own space, Ronnie Anne and Sid find a hidden room and try to keep it from the other tenants.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Planeando la quinceañera de Ronnie Anne, Rosa decide entrenarla durante los próximos tres años. Carlos mete a Carl en el ajedrez para evitar que se meta en problemas, pero Carl se toma literal el gobierno del reino.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Los Casagrande celebran la boda de Paco, pero necesitan encontrar las arras que Sergio perdió.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Héctor rechaza la oferta de Rosa de unirse a su clase de baile, pero rápidamente se pone celoso de su talentosa instructora.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Adelaide y Carl luchan para ganar las insignias de guardianes del zoológico, pero su pelea podría arruinar las oportunidades de ambos. Héctor descubre que Vito tiene una cuenta enorme en el mercado y Vito se ofrece a devolverle el dinero.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne está nerviosa por volver a subirse a su tabla después de una mala caída. Un artefacto poderoso está llegando al museo de Great Lakes City y trae consigo una tormenta para los Casagrande.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Cuando el trabajo del Sr. Chang podría ir a parar a un conductor de tren más rápido, tiene que demostrar que puede ser igual de rápido. Adelaida quiere ayudar a los gatos de la ciudad a limpiar sus actos para ser adoptados.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Arturo lleva a Bobby al bosque para enseñarle técnicas de supervivencia. Frida le pide a Carlota que pase un día con ella en el spa.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Bobby y Par deben resistirse a los tesoros de la tienda. La familia intenta evitar que Hector propague rumores.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Una niña de 11 años se adapta a su nueva vida en compañía de su familia mexicano-estadounidense, la cual regenta un mercado que abastece de productos a todo el barrio.

programme.desc: Ronnie Anne consigue la pasantía de su vida con Bruno. Carl sueña con participar en el espectáculo de medio tiempo en un partido de los Gatos y se infiltra con Alexis y la banda escolar.

programme.title: Los Casagrande
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne y Bobby tienen que soportar a un viejo amigo de Arturo, Beto la Alpaca, pero él tiene otros planes. El abuelo ayuda CJ a construir un cohete, pero tiene que mentirle cuando todo sale mal, para que no pierda la fe en él.

programme.desc: Rosa elige la actividad familiar, observar aves en el bosque, pero todo sale mal cuando Sergio es confundido con una especie rara. Cansado de no tener espacio para él, Bobby se muda en secreto a otro apartamento.

programme.desc: Ronnie Anne se entera de que en un pasado, Tio Carlos supo ser un famoso patinador y, a partir de ello, comienza a enseñarle movimientos.

programme.desc: Shauna reveals to her fiance that stripping wasn't enough. She also fears that her fiance is not the father of their son! Then, Travis denies that he is the father of Tenisha's kid because he heard that she cheated on him.

programme.desc: Korey is positive that his girlfriend Dominique is cheating on him and is also worried that she might be selling sex. She says that his suspicions have caused him to become abusive. Then, Gregory thinks that his girlfriend Robin isn’t faithful!

programme.desc: Steve’s hosting another teen girl town hall to address critical issues all teen girls could face, including drug use, physical abuse, and online predators. No question is off-limits!

programme.desc: Julian recently confessed to cheating with Joanna, Linda's sister-in-law, who actually seduced him. Joanna strongly denies having an affair and believes Julian is creating the entire event to cover his tracks. Who will Linda believe?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy, Marisol regresa por 12º vez para hacer la prueba de su 15º hombre. Luego, Dalyna vino a demostrar que Johnny Mack es el padre de su hijo. Él dice que es imposible porque le parece que el bebé es "demasiado feo" para ser suyo.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Rhonda está segura de que John es el padre de su hijo. ¡Incluso la mamá de John está de acuerdo con ella! Después, Kim y Heather solían ser amigas, pero eso fue antes de que Rick la dejara por Heather. Sin embargo, Kim está segura de que Rick es el padre.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy en MAURY, te pondremos al día con algunos de nuestros invitados más emocionantes. Los resultados de paternidad asombraron a todo el mundo. ¿Qué pasó después de revelar las respuestas y que estos invitados retomaron sus vidas?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Los huéspedes de MAURY han estado ocultando secretos horribles de sus seres queridos y eso les está desgarrando por dentro. ¡Están listos para confesar, incluso si eso les hace perder sus relaciones! ¿Se quedarán o se irán sus seres queridos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Centavia sospecha que su novio Richard la engaña con Kheisha, la niñera. Después, Kristy le revelará 2 secretos a su novio Matt que podrían terminar su relación. ¡Descubre estos secretos impactantes hoy!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: En el episodio de hoy de MAURY, estos hombres dicen que saben que la prueba de paternidad demostrará lo que siempre han sabido: que no son padres de los hijos de las mujeres que los trajeron aquí. ¡Ellas van a demostrar que están equivocados!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¡Estas mujeres han venido con preguntas urgentes! Kendra quiere que su esposo Richard admita que es el padre de su hijo Y del hijo de su amante! ¡Jevon y su familia no creen que él sea el padre del hijo de Jazmine! ¡Solo MAURY tiene las respuestas!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Grace, la madre de Eddie, no los va a dejar vivir con ella a menos que Kay Kay pueda demostrar que su hijo, Eddie, es el padre de su nieto. Después, Troy niega ser el padre de los cinco hijos de Vanessa.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: La furiosa mamá Patty quiere demostrar que el novio de su hija, Dale, un hombre que duplica la edad de su hija, ha sido infiel. ¿Entonces Bam fue infiel a Brianna en su propia cama?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Keisha sabe que Desmond es el padre de su bebé, ¡pero él la quiere fuera de su vida! Después, dos madres desesperadas se enfrentan al padre de sus tres hijos.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Kiki y su hermana Sad-e aseguran que el novio de Kiki, Tavon, es un infiel. ¿Qué dirán cuando aparezca en nuestra cámara oculta? Entonces, ¿los hijos de James y Nikkie son realmente suyos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿La esposa del pastor Terry lo engañó con 200 hombres diferentes? A continuación, Naomi quiere averiguar si su prometido, Jesse, es un infiel. ¿Qué revelarán los resultados en Maury hoy?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Maurio dice que no es padre de 5 hijos. Cuando se revelen los cinco análisis, ¿se demostrará que tiene razón o será un perdedor? ¡La familia de Jon dice que él no es el padre del bebé de Courtney! ¿Los resultados de la prueba dirán lo contrario?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Toni y Quintin regresan para averiguar quién es el padre de su hijo. ¡Esta vez se preguntarán si Toni fue infiel! ¡Jenny tiene que saber si su hijo es de su esposo o de su amiga! Finalmente, ¿Vivian pondrá fin a la búsqueda de su hijo de 30 años?

programme.title: Acorralada
programme.desc: Fedora le pide a su abogado que defienda a Gaby en el juicio para evitar que sea condenada. Deborah se encuentra con Maximiliano y Diana en el mismo hospital donde ella se encuentra.

programme.title: Acorralada

programme.title: Acorralada

programme.title: Acorralada

programme.title: Amor comprado

programme.title: Amor comprado

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kaya’s fortune and live the stolen life of luxury.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp spreads the word of Kuro’s evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but they’ve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: In an effort to save Usopp’s village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders’ path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami manages to rescue Zoro’s missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp’s friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates’ efforts to save her with a ship to call their own – the Going Merry!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the world’s greatest swordsman – but tragedy intervened.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merry’s found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Going Merry’s been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the action’s not dead in the water – Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Krieg’s pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things aren’t looking too good!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponent’s weaponry.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami – who’s on a collision course with a deadly foe!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A fierce argument over where Nami’s loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one thing’s for sure – no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami’s adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker’s younger days.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nojiko continues the story of Nami’s younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.

programme.desc: The vision of a hit on crime boss Cathan Donnegal (William McDonald) leads to Johnny's dangerous involvement with the mob.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda answers a distress call when a cargo ship is attacked. Meanwhile, Trance is interrogated after paying a visit to the people.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding. They find her, but one question remains: is it actually her?

programme.desc: The crew is separated: Dylan, Beka, and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a new weapon being developed on a planet that is distrustful of AI; Harper, Tyr, and Rev struggle for survival when the Maru crashes into the ocean.

programme.desc: Ash goes on the hunt for his beloved Delta, but becomes the hunted.

programme.title: Ash vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Deadites are no match for our hero, but the Sheriff is, when Ash is brought up on charges.

programme.title: Ash vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: An angry mob corners Ash and the team in Brock's house while Ruby tries to summon the spell to send Baal back to hell.

programme.title: Ash vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Ash wakes up in an asylum and a seemingly helpful doctor tries desperately to get him to admit his horrific acts so his healing can begin.

programme.title: Ash vs Evil Dead

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Detectives investigate a secret affair, a kidnapping plot and a racist gang when a young husband-to-be is found shot and stabbed.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a devoted mother is stabbed to death in a horrifying attack, suspicion falls on those closest to her; a cryptic note and a violent crime spree baffle detectives at first, but they eventually track down a deranged killer no one predicted.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A vibrant young mother of three is murdered in the safety of her own home and investigators look to a history of troubled romances, but when the case goes cold and police can't find the killer, a phone call leads to a culprit hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: An assassination, a bitter custody dispute and a gunman's cryptic words send police scrambling on an interstate hunt to find the killer of a beloved father and husband.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When the strangling death of a young mother and bride-to-be baffles police, detectives probe a workplace grievance in search of a killer, before a cherished possession provides a link to the crime and cracks the case wide open.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A wealthy trader and father of four is gunned-down at home while his family is tied up in a closet; police dig into affairs, mob links and a missing co-worker, until a new lead and a taped phone call reveal a plot decades later.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a young mother is found dead in a field after a night out, police scour security video to retrace a suspect's steps; the discovery of a second crime scene leads to an arrest, before high-tech forensics reveal a truth no one expected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A cat-loving and recently divorced young woman dipping her toes back in the dating game is beaten and strangled in a brutal and unusual way; investigators dive into the murky world of online dating to hunt a killer who could be ready to strike again.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Detectives discover the badly beaten body of a single young woman left bizarrely staged on her bed; fear in the community grows amid a rash of nearby murders until police are handed a break when a fresh look at old evidence points to the killer.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A beloved teacher and mother of four silently vanishes in the middle of the night; a blood-soaked bedroom and lakeside discovery point police to a killer close to home until mysterious tracks in the mud lead to a culprit no one suspected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a loving father of two is gunned down on his driveway, police uncover a hidden affair and workplace grudges before a nervous witness and chilling confession reveal a vicious vendetta from a killer no one expected.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a family that runs a beloved vet clinic is gunned down, police investigate disgruntled tenants, a pet owner with an ax to grind and an estranged son; the case stalls until detectives uncover a twisted plot by someone who seemed above suspicion.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a young mother and beloved coworker is found stabbed in her bedroom, investigators are unable to pin down a killer until secret recordings and evidence stashed in a van are found.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade returns to Africa's Okavango Delta to investigate a pack-hunting carnivore blamed for mauling the victims of a capsized boat. This time, Jeremy decides to put on his dive gear and offer himself as live bait in croc-infested waters.

programme.title: PAC-MAN and the ghostly adventures

programme.title: PAC-MAN and the ghostly adventures
programme.desc: Pac gets a huge zit right before Class Picture Day. The more stressed Pac gets about it, the more zits appear, so Betrayus sends his meanest-mouthed ghosts to stress him to the breaking point - or in this case - popping point!

programme.title: PAC-MAN and the ghostly adventures

programme.title: PAC-MAN and the ghostly adventures

programme.title: PAC-MAN and the ghostly adventures
programme.desc: Pac-Man is physically controlled by Betrayus when he swallows a special micro-chip, and Pac's friends must help him infiltrate the Netherworld spy-style to retrieve the remote controller.

programme.title: PAC-MAN and the ghostly adventures

programme.title: PAC-MAN and the ghostly adventures

programme.desc: Juan quiere saber su origen. José amenaza a Paula con su embarazo. Emilio sufre un ataque cerebrovascular. Julieta le cuenta a sus padres acerca de su enfermedad. Rosario continúa buscando la cara del violador y quiere descubrirlo.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Paula decide contarle toda la verdad a Juan. Sofía le ruega a su hija que se vayan de la hacienda. Juan está pendiente de la salud de su padre. Rosario reconoce a su violador. Modesto le confiesa a Berta que Juan y Paula son hermanos de sangre.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Irene le pide perdón a Verónica y horas más tarde recibe una carta de Gabriela donde dice: “Te perdono”. Constanza quiere demostrar que Antonia es cómplice de Aníbal Villegas. El senador tiene las cuentas congeladas. Guerra prepara una coartada.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Irene le pide perdón a Gabriela y se ofrece para reparar el daño, atestiguando en contra de Antonia. Lagarto también podría ser un testigo clave. Ricardo hace el amor con Inés y les toman fotografías. Patricia recibe las fotos y llora de rabia.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Patricia hace un discurso memorable contra Antonia y despierta la admiración de todos. Aníbal pronto estará de alta, pero le ofrece dinero al médico para que lo deje en el hospital. Lucho Vampa le roba a Antonia y Rodrigo corta relaciones con ella.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Alejandro golpea con una rabia descontrolada a Macario y termina en la comisaría. Por ahora, no podrá salir de prisión. Constanza y Gastón encuentran un sobre con la llave de una bóveda de un banco y una tarjeta electrónica con la foto de Antonia.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Las Elizondo se preocupan por los pésimos resultados obtenidos en la feria de caballos y descubren que Fernando vendió los mejores ejemplares de la hacienda, Gabriela lo encara y él la enreda.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Sara ve a Malcolm cuando espía a Norma en la tina y las dos lo acorralan para caerle a golpes. Quintina y Dominga se van a las manos por Olegario, Ruth se entera de quién es su verdadera mamá.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Norma revisa los informes de la hacienda y comprueba sus sospechas, Eva detiene a Ruth cuando se marcha de la casa y le aclara por qué la abandonó, Quintina y Dominga se vengan de Olegario.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan llega con la policía a reclamarle a Fernando la golpiza a Olegario, ambos son llevados a la comisaría. Por las noches la hacienda Elizondo se convierte en un casino de apuestas y negocios.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Con el resultado del ADN, Juan sabe que Pablo es su verdadero padre. Paula se hace un examen de embarazo. José sigue a Gaspar, mientras lleva a Simón con Beatriz. Los hermanos discuten. Julieta le hace jurar a Juan que nunca la dejará.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: José regresa a Simón con Beatriz, pero no renuncia a quitárselo legalmente. Le pide a sus hermanos que testifiquen a su favor y enfurece cuando ve que no lo apoyan. Modesto exige la verdad. Emilio al ser descubierto cuenta la verdad sobre su hijo.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: With a double U-turn looming, emotions run high when two teams accuse each other of playing dirty.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers struggle on a frightening Road Block when they're suspended high above the Atlas Mountains.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: THE AMAZING RACE takes off on its milestone 300th leg as teams race through Palermo, Sicily. Two rival teams form unlikely alliances and Racers battle to beat the clock in a high-octane go-cart race through the mountains.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time in series history, the show travels to Valletta, Malta, where teams are thrown off balance when challenged to serve drinks to the knights of Malta. Also, a blind detour leaves Racers on a slippery slope.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One dangerous misstep leaves a Racer dangling 600 feet high in the Singapore sky, while a traditional Asian detox leaves several Teams writhing in pain.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race to Manila, Philippines where they get muddy with an ornery Ox during a memorable switchback challenge from season five.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: On the penultimate leg of the Race, two strong teams make a potentially one-million-dollar mistake. Also, Phil Keoghan greets the teams with shocking news at the Pit Stop.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time ever, four teams battle it out in the final leg for the million-dollar prize, but one team will face a shocking elimination before making it to the finish line, on the season finale.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time, THE AMAZING RACE features 11 new teams of all dating duos: six who are preexisting couples, and five duos who meet for the first time at the starting line.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race through Nagano, Japan where Racers take on an Olympic-sized Detour, and one team takes a tumble that may jeopardize their chances in the Race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Tensions rise in Thailand as one team forgets their fanny pack, putting them behind, and one Racer celebrates the end of the leg when they pop a very special question.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams face a race within the Race when they attempt to navigate the chaotic streets of Bangkok, and Racers eat a traditional delicacy - a "1,000 year old egg.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers strap on lederhosen for a trip to Oktoberfest in Bavaria, Germany, and one team finds their race in jeopardy after losing their fanny pack.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time, the Race travels to Monaco, where one team takes a big risk to gain an edge on the competition.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy's son, Opie, demands that their new housekeeper, Andy's aunt, be fired after the old one leaves to get married.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy gives the state troopers a lesson in the efficiency of a county sheriff when a dangerous criminal escapes.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A hometown guitar player auditions with a dance band in the Mayberry jail.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Ellie Walker, a pretty young graduate pharmacist, moves to Mayberry to help her uncle out in the local drugstore.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
