programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Snakes Alive
programme.desc: Jack is counting down his scaliest, slitheriest, snakiest safaris ever. From green anacondas and cobras to eastern diamondbacks, puff adders, taipans and more… this Wild Countdown has teeth!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he heads to South Africa to meet a very special, and critically endangered, Southern black Rhino named Munu, who's lost his vision, but found his forever home at Founder's Lodge.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack visits the Sao Paulo Zoo, where a small cat-breeding program aims to save many of Brazil's endangered wildcats including the Margay, Oncilla and Pampas Cat.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and his family as they visit an Australian rainforest and have birds eating out of their hands. Then the whole family goes climbing to find out how life is like in the treetops and Jack discovers a rare wild bird.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Gone Fishin
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack is counting down his most unbelievable big fish stories from beneath the waves!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Tall Tails
programme.desc: If you’ve ever wondered why animals have tails, join Jungle Jack for today’s tales about tails! Some tails are dangerous, some are powerful, and some are critical for high-speed navigation. Dolphins, ccorpions, crocs, lemurs and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Meet the loveable loners of the animal kingdom. Moose, Black Rhinos, Leatherback Sea Turtles, Platypus, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Loango National Park in Gabon is often called Africa's Last Eden. Come along with Jack and his family as they explore the untouched wilderness, encountering Forest Elephants, Forest Buffalo, an injured Sea Turtle and the wildest beach on the planet!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack takes flight in Panama in search of Bats, Birds and other Jungle Creatures! Jack discovers how Bats are vital to Earth's pest control, and learns about one of the coolest adaptations in the animal world – echolocation!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Find out why all of the animals on today’s countdown are showing off their pearly whites. From the hippos' mega-chompers to snakes with fangs that inject toxic venom, and piranhas, crocs, African elephants and more.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Today, Jack is counting down animals that count on each other! Birds that groom buffalo, lions that feed jackals, and catfish fed by bats are just some of the amazing symbiotic relationships on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Dive in for an epic adventure to the Galapagos Islands. Marine Iguanas, Giant Tortoises, Sea Lions, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack for an adventure with rare and unique animals that all wear white. Arctic wolves, beluga whales, polar bears, white zebras and even an albino alligator!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he travels to the remote Sukau River on the island of Borneo in Malaysia where he gets a seldom-seen look at pygmy elephants as they emerge from the rain forest.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack is counting down six stupendous sights- from the treetops of Panama to the mountain tops of Patagonia, the sky above Kenya, to the ocean floor and much more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he comes face-to-face with the powerful pachyderms of Chobe National Park. The park is known for its massive elephant population, but Jack also encounters Hippos, Cape Buffalo, Kudu, Crocs, Warthogs, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wildlife Crime-Fighters
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading to the frontlines witnessing conservation and anti-poaching efforts in action around the world all to help save threatened and endangered species. Rhinos, elephants, primates and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with the ultimate Jack-of-all-trades as he immerses himself in exciting and sometimes dirty jobs caring for animals. A vet's assistant caring for Rhinos, a Bat researcher in South America, working with a King Cobra in Malaysia, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along on an epic adventure to meet the big cats of Tanzania. These top predators include Lions, Cheetahs, and Leopards.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack joins the conservationists racing to save incredible species from extinction. Sea Turtles, Giraffe, Painted Dogs, Cheetahs, Whooping Cranes, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading into devil country in Tasmania, Australia to meet up with leading-edge researchers who are working to save Tasmanian Devils from a deadly cancer that is wiping out the population.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with Jack on an adventure to bear country in Montana! Jack and some local bear experts come face-to-face with a grizzly that raided a family's farmhouse. Then Jack discovers amazing animal behaviors caught on tape.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In a rainforest outside Rio de Janeiro, Jack visits a breeding program that's slowly restoring the wild population of endangered Golden Lion Tamarins.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi spend the day inside Tanzania's famed Ngorongoro Crater. The dormant volcano is home to hyena, lion, hippo, wildebeest, and loads of other creatures.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Find out the answers to some of nature’s biggest mysteries! Why do gorillas spend so much time in trees, why do male lions have such shaggy manes, why do jellyfish live upside down? You’ve got questions, and Jungle Jack has the answers!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Just Beachy
programme.desc: The creatures on today’s countdown love the beach just as much as Jungle Jack! Come along for a coastal adventure with African penguins, sea lions, marine iguanas, elephant seals and sea turtles.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In "Message for Maureen," a famous female tennis pro (Brenda Benet) confined to a wheelchair as the result of a serious accident, finds herself in a relationship with a sports writer (Bill Bixby) who was once her severest critic.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In "Help, Murder," Denise and Bret (Michele Lee and David Groh) are a married couple getting away from their three kids for the first time.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In "The Joker is Mild," has-been comedian Barry Keyes (Phil Foster) abuses his family tie with cruise director Julie in an astonishing attempt to make a comeback.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In "The Identical Problem," twins Helen and Ellen (both played by Diana "Soap" Canova) pretend to be one person, which nearly drives Doc crazy because Helen is warm, Ellen is cold and Doc is feeling amorous.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A boy befriends a couple that recently lost its young son. A trainee schemes to steal Julie's job. A bickering married couple takes the cruise and stays in separate cabins...next door to each other.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: The presence of the captain's demanding father leaves the entire crew on edge. A dog traps a passenger in his cabin. Three friends reunite on board the ship and try to meet men through an unusual game. (TV-PG)

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: An advice columnist neglects her husband to devote all her time to her fans, prompting him to seek affection elsewhere. A man with a negative history with Capt. Stubing fills in for the ailing chef.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In a Christmas-themed cruise, the captain worries about how to effectively lead his ship but be a friend to his crew as well. A married couple who outwardly appear happy and in love are both desperate for the other person to give them a divorce.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A crotchety old man and a teenage runaway form an unlikely friendship. Julie grows frustrated when an old friend of her brother's repeatedly rejects her advances without explanation.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A woman who believes her departed dad was a noble sea captain forms an attachment for a devilish old purser; a newlywed couple are prevented by dislocated backs, sunburn, and even poison ivy from enjoying their honeymoon.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Isaac's possessive mother becomes jealous of her son's lady friend, while he objects to his mom sharing a cabin with her latest boyfriend; a divorced comedy team is too busy making jokes to admit they miss each other.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Millionaire superstars Roz and Bill (Michele Lee and Fernando Lamas) have remarried and are celebrating their newest honeymoon aboard the Pacific Princess in "Hollywood Royalty.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Anytime, anywhere, people disappear – kidnapped from their daily routines. Predators always leave clues behind, but chasing them takes time, hampering investigators' attempts to solve these fatal abductions.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A millionaire is found dead, murdered for a stash of buried silver. A young woman dates violent men, only to be killed by her best friend.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Tool marking: A tool used to commit a crime can often be the same tool used to solve it. The pattern a machine leaves on an item, the unusual way a tool crimps a wire, and even something as innocuous as the shape of a wood chip can lead to a killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators are always on the cutting edge of new forensic techniques that can help them solve cases more accurately. An experimental “brain fingerprinting” technique has already won the acquittal of a police officer accused of a drug charge.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: New Forensic Techniques used to Solve Old Cases: Advancement in science and technology are encouraging people to revisit the past in hopes of answering questions that have remained unanswered, and solving crimes that seemed unsolvable.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: This show profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts as they work to tell the stories of the young men who went to war (from the French and Indian war to Vietnam) and never came back.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For a price, anything's possible. Contract killings arose out of the need to establish the perfect alibi. By hiring someone else to do the dirty work, a person can deflect guilt, at least in theory.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Weeks pass as forensic investigators search for even the smallest clues, only to find what they feared in their own backyard. In Canada, two people die suddenly of unknown causes, and their deaths may not be as coincidental as they first appear.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There's never a good reason for murder, but some killers are particularly brutal—choosing their prey at random or with no apparent motive and then cunningly covering their tracks. Even so, telltale clues remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Psychological Profiling: Journey into the dark recesses and calculated madness present only in our worst nightmares…and in the minds of serial killers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When there's a difficult case to crack – whether it involves drugs, arson, or weapons – the investigators and scientists of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms have the means to crack it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas, Mark, and Micah get lost in Old Mexico, they are held hostage by a group of bandits who intend to kill the men and take Mark as a slave.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While trapped in the ghost town saloon, Lucas tries to come up with a plan to escape with his son and Micah after Mark refuses to leave without him.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lou Mallory arrives in North Fork and starts buying up land and businesses. Lou and Lucas start disliking each other after she reveals plans to build a railroad on "worthless" land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a woman arrives in North Fork with symptoms of smallpox, Lucas, Lou Mallory, Doctor Burrage, and hotel occupants are quarantined in the hotel with an outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gunslinger Johnny Drako rides into town and tells the bartender that he is looking for Lucas McCain. After Johnny leaves the saloon, Sweeney hurries to tell Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A man arrives in North Fork, intending to marry Lou Mallory. The hotel owner looks for a way out from marrying the man to whom her dying father promised her.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An assassination plot unfolds as four gunmen disguised as cavalrymen enter North Fork. Their target: Sen. Jim Borden. Their weapon: a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sharpshooter Marty Blair tries to persuade Lucas to buy Mark a rifle. After Lucas shoots a man during a robbery at the hotel, Mark and Lucas disagree with his character.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Fast-draw artist Wade Randall is in town, bragging of his gun battles with notorious bad men until one of them shows up to challenge his story.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas refuses to sell his land, Mr. Prescott will stop at nothing to change his mind. He hires men to try to persuade Lucas, but he refuses.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark's careless actions cause the death of a friend. Unable to accept the truth, he blames the rifle and runs away from home. Soon, he is faced with a tough decision.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Nils Swenson takes the marshal's place for a few days while Micah is away. To maintain peace, Nils insists that anyone coming into town must turn in their weapons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas's self-confidence begins to slip away when he misses an easy shot that could have cost Mark his life.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A murder occurs at a railroad camp and a young Indian friend of Lucas is accused of the killing. When Lucas tries to help the boy, he finds himself on trial.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark come upon Winslow Quince, a peddler whose wagon has broken down. They help him bring his wagon to North Fork for repair.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Gridley Mau, the son of a man Lucas killed during an attempted robbery, comes to North Fork looking for revenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The first railroad train is coming to the new North Fork station. Onboard is a Japanese nobleman and his servant, visiting the West to learn about the United States.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: At Halloween, rustlers take advantage of the seasonal disguises to raid a cattle ranch. Lucas' faith in his son's honesty is shaken when he hears rumors of Mark being mixed up with the thieves.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Lucas run into Micah on the trail and help when the prisoner he is transporting injures his arm. Lucas' life is endangered when a snake crawls into his bed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Mark goes hunting for Old Spike, Lucas goes hunting for his mortal enemy. Lucas is thrown into jail to stop him from murdering his former friend.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is baffled when the marshal of a neighboring town refuses to hold a gambler who just attempted murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark is injured in an accident, leaving his legs paralyzed. At the doctor's suggestion, Lucas and Mark set out on a trek to Mission Springs.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mario Arsatti claims to be an acquaintance of a good friend from Lucas' past. But it's pleasure before business. Mario has been hired to kill Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas, who blames his wife's death on his father-in-law, refuses to help the old man elude a gang of gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The lazy Jackman brother's mortgage has been foreclosed. Unfit for farming, they head to a nearby town. The family patriarch becomes marshal and deputizes his sons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his girlfriend discover that an old hermit is very lonely. Old Tony invites them to lunch and lets them look for arrowheads on a remote part of his land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark decide to enter a local turkey shoot to raise money to buy a ranch.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Genet ensures to strengthen her base of power; Daryl has a job to do before he can go back to America.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others have a difficult time assimilating into Alexandria; a new threat arises that could bring the group closer together.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When it appears that things are starting to normalize in the settlement, a new problem arises for the Alexandrians.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A small group, including Rick, runs into hurdles while trying to return to Alexandria, and some may not make it back.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Morgan recalls his travels from King County to Alexandria, where he encountered a solo survivor who taught him a new code to live by.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The sheltered citizens inside the walls of Alexandria must face a grim reality that might be too much for them to handle; Deanna doubts her leadership.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Abraham and Sasha encounter many obstacles and a new threat while trying to return to Alexandria.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Alexandria is finally able to begin pulling itself back together; peace is embraced between the two groups.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After a few moments of peace, trouble finds its way to Alexandria again with a threat that may be too big to defeat.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Now that walkers have shown up inside the gates of Alexandria, Rick and the other survivors are scared and outnumbered.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A simple scavenging run proves to be more tricky, when the survivors are not the only ones after a goldmine of supplies.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After realizing that Alexandria may not be as safe as he originally thought, Rick must make decisions about where to go.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others determine that the only way to keep peace in Alexandria, is to wage a war with a new enemy.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After a minor success, two members of the group are taken hostage; Carol struggles morally with the lengths she has gone to survive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras Rick se ocupa de viejas heridas, los miembros de la prisión tienen que adaptarse al nuevo entorno y preguntarse a sí mismos si la supervivencia por sí sola es suficiente.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo encuentra muchos obstáculos tratando de encontrar estabilidad y seguridad, pero a veces lo único que los guía es la esperanza.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Justo cuando Rick piensa que va a poder relajarse, se enfrenta a múltiples peligros inmediatos. Otros integrantes del grupo lidian con su pasado.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Enfrentados a la supervivencia diaria fuera del refugio, un simple pedido de uno de los integrantes del grupo conduce a una misión extraña pero instructiva.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras un grupo encuentra lo que podría ser un refugio ideal, otro grupo se da cuenta de que la mejor protección es la que brindan las personas que los acompañan.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de encontrar un lugar idílico para establecer un nuevo refugio, el grupo comienza a cuestionarse si es posible que las cosas vuelvan a ser como eran antes.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aunque algunos sobrevivientes crean que deben ser brutales para mantenerse con vida, vemos que la fe a veces puede ser la herramienta de supervivencia más poderosa.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras múltiples caminos se entrechocan, Rick se enfrenta cara a cara con la brutalidad más absoluta. ¿Él y su grupo tendrán lo que hace falta para sobrevivir?

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En el comienzo de la quinta temporada, conoceremos las verdaderas intenciones de la gente de Terminus; mientras, Rick y el grupo se encuentran rodeados, superados en armas y en número.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Con pocas provisiones, y sin poder confiar en la gente a su alrededor, Rick lidera una misión donde el riesgo podría ser mucho mayor que la recompensa.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Enfrentados a un grupo de personas despreciables, Rick y sus compañeros deberán idear un plan para obtener una ventaja decisiva.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En este episodio conoceremos a otro grupo de sobrevivientes. Pero lo que parece seguro y agradable por fuera tiene también un lado oscuro.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Nuevos problemas generan nuevas disputas en el grupo durante una misión. ¿Conseguirán superar las diferencias y sobrevivir a este desafío?

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En una heroica misión de rescate, algunos miembros del grupo deben volver a un lugar familiar. El escenario será tan grande como el riesgo de la misión.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack meets an old flame at the park who is seeking advice about her jealous husband. Furley joins them, and they all get poison oak. Later, at Jack's house, Furley tells the husband they were all in the bushes together.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack and Furley get locked in a freezer together. Convinced they are going to die, they have a heart-to-heart talk, and Jack confesses that he really isn't gay. Once safe, Jack worries because Furley knows the truth about him.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: The trio plants a stray cat at Furley's door, hoping he'll bend his rules and keep it. When a girl appears looking for her kitten, Furley lies and says he took it to the pound; so Jack and the girls search the pounds and bring home three different cats.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: After a night on the town with his old navy buddies, Jack discovers he has a tattoo on his derriere. When Jack goes to the hospital to have it removed, Janet thinks he is having a vasectomy and Furley thinks he is having a sex change.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack offers to model for a beautiful art teacher and finds himself nude in front of her classroom when Furley walks in. Jack begs Furley not to tell, but the secret is out when a nude portrait of Jack appears at the Regal Beagle.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack borrows Janet's new car to drive a gorgeous model to a photo session and totals the car on the way home. He pretends to have amnesia in the hospital, but Janet gets suspicious and concocts a plan to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: A customer of the flower shop names Janet in his will, and she receives a vase. His nephew, Philip, an art collector, visits Janet, and Jack thinks he lied about the value of the vase and is trying to get it back.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack meets an attractive stewardess, Vicky Bradford; but between her father and her dates, she doesn't seem to have time for Jack. Janet announces her engagement to Philip, while Jack is jealous and lovesick.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack thinks Vicky wants a job in Houston and encourages her, causing her to think he wants to end their relationship. She interrupts Janet's wedding to find out why. They make up and the ceremony resumes. Jack proposes and is stunned by Vicky's refusal.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Vicky explains that she is afraid of marriage and suggests to Jack that they live together. Jack reluctantly agrees. They are toasting their first night together in their new apartment when they are interrupted by Mr. Bradford.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: In order to convince their landlord, Mr. Roper, that there is nothing going on between them and their new male roommate, Chrissy and Janet tell him that Jack is gay.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Chrissy's visiting mother, not knowing that the girls have rented the spare room to Jack, causes havoc when she decides to spend the night with them.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Roper feels convinced that his niece will be safe going out with Jack, and Jack would rather be with Janet and Chrissy celebrating Janet's birthday, until he sees the niece.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack's fast-talking friend, Larry, gives Jack and the girls a puppy and the kids go to all lengths keeping this from Roper who forbids animals in his building.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack has guilt feelings about not standing up to the tough guy who makes a play for Chrissy at the local pub and goes back the next night to tell the Casanova off.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Panic reigns in the apartment when Mr. Roper takes the rent money without leaving the girls and Jack a receipt, making them think their place was robbed.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack and Chrissy walk in while Janet is entertaining a date, fostering a new rule on privacy.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack, realizing he can't meet his obligations to pay his share of the rent, gets a part-time modeling job only to find out that he's expected to pose nude. Guest Star(s): Sally Kirkland

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Jack and Chrissy apparently do Janet a disfavor by talking her into trying for a promotion at the florist shop where she works.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: When Chrissy and Janet go away for the weekend, Jack throws a wild party and Stanley Roper gets the morning-after blues.

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Chrissy falls for an older man she meets at the supermarket. Jack is jealous, but he's even more upset when Mr. Roper tells Jack and Janet that she knows the man's wife. Guest Star(s): Dick Sargeant

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Janet moves in with Mrs. Roper while Mr. Roper is away on business, then stews about Jack and Chrissy being alone for the night in the trio's upstairs apartment.

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Three's Company
programme.desc: Chrissy, whose skills in the kitchen aren't exactly sharp, invites a gourmet to share a home-cooked dinner, then pleads with Jack to be her secret stand-in-chef.

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.title: Three's Company

programme.desc: Terrible-Monster Sabotendar appears. It gets defeated by Ace, but then transforms into a red cactus flower, waiting for its resurrection. TAC gets ahold of the specimen from a boy named Saburo, and then they try to rid of it in outer space, but...

programme.title: Ultraman Ace
programme.desc: Ace loses his battle as his brothers are taken as hostages. TAC's Commanding Officer Takakura decides upon the total destruction of Planet Golgotha using the Superluminal Missile and appoints Hokuto as its pilot.

programme.title: Ultraman Ace
programme.desc: While TAC's Imano is back home in Okayama for a holiday, he meets a boy named Yumeji who can talk with a horseshoe crab. The horseshoe crab warns Yumeji and Seiji that a terrible monster is on its way to Earth. The battle with King Crab begins!

programme.title: Ultraman Ace
programme.desc: TAC's Yoshimura meets up with Takai on his way back home. Troublemaker Takai takes a nose ring from a sacred hill that worships cattle. That night, Takai's body undergoes a transformation and he eventually becomes Cowra, the Cattle God Terrible-Monster!

programme.title: Ultraman Ace
programme.desc: Many accidents were reported in Hotarugawara Bypass. Strangely, all persons involved in the accidents were skeletonized. Yuko arrives at the scene to investigate and becomes friends with a wheelchair-bound girl called Tamiko.

programme.title: Ultraman Ace
programme.desc: Seiji and Yuko meet Saburo, a boy who can control pigeons. Seiji comes up with an idea to integrate the homing instinct of pigeons into their current airplane module development and borrows Saburo's pigeon Kojiro. The Yapool notice this development...

programme.title: Ultraman Ace
programme.desc: Yasuo, a boy who always lies, sees Terrible-Monster King Kappa turn into the Haruyama family's pool, but no one believes him. The Haruyamas invite Yasuo's sister and friends over for a pool party. That night, the children transform into kappa-humans.

programme.title: Ultraman Ace

programme.title: Mike Alvarado vs Brandon Rios 2
programme.desc: On March 30th, 2013, Mike Alvarado fought Brandon Rios for the WBO Light Welterweight Title at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas. In the rematch, Alvarado avenged his loss by earning a unanimous decision victory in an absolute battle.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs Percy Harris
programme.desc: On December 5th, 1992 Roy Jones Jr. fought Percy Harris for the WBC Continental Americas Super Middleweight title at the Trump Taj Mahal in Atlantic city with Jones defeating Harris in the 4th round by technical knockout.

programme.title: Roberto Duran vs Jimmy Batten
programme.desc: On November 12th, 1982 Roberto Duran faced Jimmy Batten at the Orange Bowl in Miami, Fl. It ended in an unanimous decision victory for Duran.

programme.title: Mike Weaver vs John Tate
programme.desc: On March 31st, 1990 Mike Weaver fought John Tate at the Stokley Athletics Center in Knoxville in a 15 round bout for the WBA World heavyweight title that ended by knockout in the 15th round securing the victory for Weaver.

programme.title: Montell Griffin vs James Toney 1
programme.desc: On February 18th, 1995 Montell Griffin faced James Toney for the first time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the IBF Inter-continental Light Heavyweight title with the bout ending with a majority decision win for Griffin.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Cleveland Williams
programme.desc: On November 14th, 1966 Muhammad Ali faced Cleveland Williams at the Astrodome in Houston, TX. They fought for WBC World Heavyweight titles in what was supposed to be a 15 round bout only went 3 resulting in a win for Ali.

programme.title: Johnny Tapia vs Danny Romero
programme.desc: On July 18th, 1997, Johnny Tapia fought Danny Romero for the IBF & WBO Super Flyweight Titles at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas. In a highly anticipated fight and an incredible battle, Tapia came out on top with a close unanimous decision win.

programme.title: Jorge Arce vs Hussein Hussein
programme.desc: On March 19th, 2005, Jorge Arce fought Hussein Hussein in a WBC Flyweight Title Eliminator at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. In an action-packed fight, the victorious Jorge Arce scored the knockdown in the 10th round that stopped the fight.

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Curtis Strong
programme.desc: On February 6th, 1993 Oscar De La Hoya and Curtis Strong fought at the Sports Arena in San Diego, Ca. in a 6 round bout that lasted 4 rounds ending in a technical knockout victory for De La Hoya.

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Felix Sturm
programme.desc: On June 5th, 2004 Oscar De La Hoya fought Felix Sturm at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the WBO Middleweight title in a 12 round bout resulting in an unanimous decision win for De La Hoya.

programme.title: Jose Luis Castillo vs. Stevie Johnston 1
programme.desc: On June 17th, 2000, Jose Luis Castillo fought Stevie Johnston for the WBC Lightweight Title in Bell Gardens, California. In a very close fight, Castillo took the world by surprise with a majority decision victory that was The Ring Upset of the Year.

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Giorgio Campanella
programme.desc: On May 27th, 1994 Oscar De La hoya fought Giorgio Campanella at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas for the WBO World Super Featherweight title with De La Hoya knocking out Campanella in the thrid round securing his victory.

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Hector Camacho
programme.desc: On September 13th, 1997 Oscar De La Hoya fought Hector Camacho for the WBC World Welterweight title at the Thomas and Mack Center in Las Vegas the twelve round bout ended in a unanimous decision victory for De La Hoya.

programme.title: Jose Ramirez vs Amir Imam
programme.desc: On March 17th, 2018 Jose Ramirez fought Amir Imam for the vacant WBC World Super Lightweight title at Madison Square Garden Hulu Theater in New York with the twelve-round bout ending in a unanimous decision win for Ramirez.

programme.title: Hollywood Exes

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The animals of the ring, The Beast and Jungle Grrrl battle to determine dominance. Meanwhile, WOW World Champion Tessa Blanchard seizes an opportunity to settle a score.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: After months of being bullied, Stephy Slays finally gets her shot at revenge against The Governor’s Daughter, Abilene Maverick. The Tag Team Championship continues when The Monsters of Madness battle The Dixie Darlings, Jolene, and Jolynn.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Champion Tessa Blanchard and The Greatest Attorney in the World, Sophia Lopez conspire In an attempt to derail The Beast’s path to The WOW World Championship Title by placing The Norweigen Nightmare, Nikki Krampus in her way.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Anticipation builds as Jungle Grrrl gets a rematch against The Beast to determine the rightful contender to the WOW World Championship. To ensure a fair outcome, Champion Tessa Blanchard has been barred from ringside.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Jungle Grrrl calls out The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for her Championship Match. With her back against the well, Tessa is forced to get creative and strikes a deal with The Fabulous Lana Star. Will The Fabulous One help Tessa Blanchard or turn on her?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Beast calls out The Fabulous Lana Star for costing her a shot at The WOW World Championship. And Jungle Grrrl finally battles The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for the WOW World Championship in The Main Event.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Chaos, disorder, bedlam, and madness are all promised in a high-stakes Three-Way Elimination between The Monsters of Madness, Havok and Hazard, Holidead and Siren The Voodoo Doll, & Adrenaline and Fire.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: It’s The Monsters of Madness vs. Adrenaline and Fire. Both teams will test their metal. In the end, only one will claim victory as The WOW Tag Team Champions of the World! Will speed overcome power and strength? Or will size dominate the underdogs?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Since day one when Abilene Maverick 'accidentally' poured tea on Stephy Slays, Stephy has endured Abilene’s teasing and bullying. After avoiding a match with Stephy on several occasions due to suspicious claims of injury, the match has finally been set.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans previously witnessed the rise of The Beast as the new WOW World Champion. The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard plots to get the championship belt back by partnering with The World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Fans previously witnessed the rise of The Beast as the new WOW World Champion. The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard plots to get the championship belt back by partnering with The World’s Greatest Attorney, Sophia Lopez.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard’s feud reaches a boiling point after Jungle Grrrl makes it personal. The Fabulous, Lana Star sets the record straight against allegations and brings a surprising new client to WOW.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The personalities and conflict have been brewing for weeks, making anything possible in tonight’s Six Women Tag Team Match Main Event with no time limit.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A concerned father hires Josh to retrieve his son, a passionate young ideologue whose gift for rousing rhetoric is being used by plunderers to recruit freedom fighters.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh's big talk after a dog is shot lands him in big trouble when his browbeating the locals in the saloon about ending the decades-long Carter-Blake feud.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To track down the cheating tinhorn gambler Johnny Deuce and recover his money, Randall befriends the card sharp's protégé, a 12-year-old orphan boy and card cheat, nicknamed The Montana Kid.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh embarks on a mission of mercy when he pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh reluctantly accepts an offbeat assignment: finding a beautiful bride for his bashful buddy Charlie, the homeliest and loneliest man in the West.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall finds his prey in the hands of a lynch mob wiping out his bounty.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Who needs enemies with friends like the residents of Rogue City, who celebrate Randall for bringing in notorious killer Jumbo Kane.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is rooked out of his bounty by crafty criminal Hunt Willis and his accomplice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Against better judgment after losing a quick draw contest and bet, Josh serves as a guide for a dandified East Coast gun salesman who comes west to retrieve and replace a defective gun he sold to notorious outlaw Curly Bill Brocius.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: On the trail of a Cavalry deserter and the horses he stole, Josh rides into a town ruled as the private fiefdom of its autocratic, psychopathic marshal who is holding the horses and deserter.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Hired by a father to bring back the man who killed his son Josh is surprised when he doesn't get paid because he brought the man back alive.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh must bring a man back for murder.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings a wanted man into the Mesa City Sheriff, only to find he killed the sheriff's brother.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is looking for a man who, while trying to rob a bank, is bitten by a rabid dog.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A man shoots his brother over ownership of their property and blames it on an Indian who reclaimed his horse the man found and stole.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is captured by a corrupt deputy and is forced by the sheriff to work on a chain gang in a gold mine.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Randall is tracking an escape artist who is forced to distract a town, letting three guys rob the bank.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh plays detective when he signs on to help an amnesiac discover his identity.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: After watching her father stabbed to death, a grieving daughter wants immediate justice rather than wait for the slower-moving wheels of justice.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is determined to debunk the dire menace posed by a marauding monster that has smashed mining camps, decimated an Indian village, and has the Nugget City residents hiding behind locked doors.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh, down on his luck, hires out for $100/day to find a woman - one catch is she may be dead.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings in \\"Doc\\" Phillips hoping he can lure Clell Fanning out as he has an old score to settle with Clell.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is arrested on a bogus horse-stealing charge.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To net a thousand-dollar reward and save a friend, Josh saves Tolliver Bender from hanging so he can testify in a nearby trial.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: An attractive woman hires Josh for $1000 to clear her father on a false murder charge in a town that is not very welcoming to Josh.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Jason are hired to chase a killer who went to Mexico by his brother who is about to hang for a crime his brother committed.

channel.display-name: Warner Bros. TV Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Best friend brides fall in love with the same dress; two bride friends insist on keeping their final gown reveals a secret from one another until their wedding day.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Chasity is looking for a fabulous dress for her Vegas themed wedding; bride Sarah's mother thinks her dress vision is too fancy for her barn wedding; bride Gail hopes her dieting will not affect her final fitting.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Basketball player Glory Johnson searches for a gown with the help of her fellow WNBA player Brittney Griner; the pressure to find the one puts Glory in a self-image slump.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Lisa has only weeks until her big day and an opinionated fiance to help her dress shop; bride Christina's long-distance engagement has left her family and friends weary.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Brandi hopes to find a dress similar to what her idle, singer Jessie James Decker, wore on her wedding day; bride Liz struggles to embrace her new body in a dress.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: The only opinion that matters to bride Kiara is her grandfathers, but she falls for a dress that is over budget; one bride struggles to find a dress that matches her vision along with her fiance's.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Michelle has focused on helping her fiance recover from an accident and spent no time on her wedding; bride Ronesha thinks she has a very clear vision of her wedding dress.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Tareka wants to trade her city chic style for a country gown, but her entourage disagrees; one bride searches for a modest dress to match her casual style.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Jibrell wants to look like a princess,but her unfiltered mother may turn her big day into a nightmare; bride Kassie has a difficult time finding a gown with her late mother; bride Bianca hopes to impress her parents with her dress choice.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: A bride's country superstar boss; a runaway bride's short gown; one bride's unique request at her fitting.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Surprising a superfan and bride-to-be, Katie, with an extra special shopping experience at the salon.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Katherine wants a vintage dress she can wear with cowboy boots, but her friend is pushing for something else; bride Dawn's son gives Monte a run for his money as he seeks out the perfect dress for his mom.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Jaye is eager to try on gowns, but is shocked to find her sister has taken her place on the runway; bride Allysa searches for a unique dress to compliment a medieval themed wedding.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Nikki gets a big surprise when her celebrity idol shows up to help her choose a wedding gown; bride Melody is ready to see her custom jet-black gown, but her mom may not approve.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: YouTube Sensation and bride, BFFTaylor won't feel satisfied with her dress until her mom cries; Olympian bride Kellie Wells comes in tow with Team Conservative and Team Sexy.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Precious falls in love with a grand ballgown, but her men of honor think it's a royal mistake; Emily said yes to her fiancé after 6 weeks of dating, but finding the perfect dress in time for her upcoming wedding takes longer than expected.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Saba needs a dress that fits her conservative Ethiopian culture, but can still be fun and sexy for the reception; Tiffany gets Lori and Monte to stand in for her mom and dad, who live too far away to help.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Lori and Monte hit the road to surprise a very special bride getting married in 2 days; due to a recent tragedy, bride Anna has not taken the time to find a dress, but the team is certain they can save the day.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: WNBA star and Bride Angel has a game plan to say yes to a pantsuit but her friend thinks she should sport a dress; Angel's fiancée, Brande, isn't sure about the kind of dress she wants; Bride Cassie is on the hunt for the perfect veil.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: According to Sarah's mom they already found the perfect dress but Sarah isn't convinced; Comfort loves bling but her mom doesn't.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Jennifer is a breast cancer survivor who wants to show off her curves, but Mom prefers her mounds to be covered; Jasmine's mom has always questioned her style, but Lori suspects that's not the only reason she's doubting this bride's vision.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Raucous returning bride Stacy is back to find another dress to reflect her motorcycle-chic style; Jessica wants a modern dress for her beach wedding but her mother-in-law is set on tradition.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Lori and Monte head to Nashville to help country artist Jimmy Stanley with a surprise proposal to fellow singer Kristin Kelley.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Country singer Stephanie only has 13 days to find the perfect dress; Krischell must narrow down her 500 dress vision board.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Jeanette wants a black dress, but her parents are hoping for something less depressing; Mackenzie's 100-year-old dress didn't turn out as planned, and with two weeks until the wedding, she'll need a new one that won't blow her budget.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Shanna's outspoken mom makes her daughter's bridal appointment difficult; Suzanne and her teen daughter, acting as her wedding planner, differ on a bridal vision.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Lori's son is getting married, and taking a back seat is anything but easy for this queen of bridal; Monte helps plan the perfect wedding for Cory and Becca.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Consultant Becca helps Lindsey find a dress despite a ticking clock and an opinionated entourage; Kisha's path to the altar has been full of drama and she hopes her happy ending is within reach, but a surprise may postpone her walk down the aisle.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Monte's BFF is shopping for her wedding dress, but he's not the only man who thinks he knows what's best for the bride; Marcia's uncles are strictly Team Sparkle, but Mom's preference for simple might be an obstacle.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bride Alyssa's future is bright following her life-threatening battle with kidney disease, and a day of surprises is just the start of her brand new journey; bride Shornell's last-minute dress dilemma has the consultants scrambling for a solution.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown honors the 35th anniversary of the Christmas movie "Gremlins" by challenging the three finalists to build even bigger and better showpieces; Paige Davis gives the bakers a week to bring the movie to life in gingerbread.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon shows that Thanksgiving is the perfect time to fire up the grill, starting with traditional spatchcock smoked turkey; he follows with his corn pudding and pecan tassies for dessert, and wife Liz serves mulled wine.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Grubdown
programme.desc: Carla Hall discovers some Thanksgiving traditions with a twist, including pumpkin pancakes piled high with a slice of cheesecake, a complete dinner reimagined as a giant sandwich, and a 23-pound cake made with layers of holiday pies.

programme.title: Turkey Day Sunny's Way
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson is named the first guest editor of Food Network Magazine; Sunny invites friends who are featured in the magazine to share favorite holiday recipes; Sunny makes grilled turkey with lemon pepper glaze and crowd-sourced stuffing.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: The morning after Thanksgiving, Giada De Laurentiis feeds her guests with a brunch made from Thanksgiving leftovers; crispy turkey bites; cheesy root vegetable bake; sweet potato puffs; rye-spiked chai lattes.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Savory butternut squash crostata; lemony fried chicken; tiramisu ice box torta; lambrusco sangria; the table is filled with a variety of fall pies for guests to sample and enjoy as they celebrate the start of the holiday season.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: It's the day after Thanksgiving, and that usually means three things: college football, Christmas shopping and Thanksgiving leftovers; Giada marks the official start of the Christmas season with wrapping gifts and delicious food.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis kicks off the season with a buffet brunch that features the flavors of autumn; bacon cranberry scones with citrus basil butter; sweet potato; kale Spanish frittata; smoked salmon waffles with waffle bar; apple raspberry sangrias.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada hosts a harvest-themed festival for her neighbors; the feast includes roasted squash and gorgonzola pizza, made with Giada's own pizza dough, complemented with Italian carrot salad and spiced apple cake.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada hosts a formal brunch for her family on Christmas day, with a California twist; her menu includes beef tenderloin with scallion salsa verde, a crab and artichoke frittata, olive biscuits and a decadent chocolate panettone sformato for dessert.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada helps her girlfriends jump-start the new year with a fun gathering that focuses on wellness and self-care; she serves a buffet menu of her healthy wedge salad, broiled salmon with fennel salad, and herb de provence roasted potatoes.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis and her daughter Jade host a Christmas party for Jade and her friends; Giada prepares a batch of holiday cutout sugar cookies that the kids can decorate using a variety of fun toppings and frosting.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Roasted fennel with parmesan; creamy lobster pasta; chocolate almond cheesecake; citrus berry vermouth spritz.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada hosts a Halloween open house for neighborhood trick-or-treaters and their parents; Giada creates spooky menu for her guests which includes Coconut Bones, Spooky Chicken Finger Sammies, Witches' Brooms and Here's Looking at Boo Treats.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis throws a pre-Christmas party for the kids; holiday sing-along; cheesy chicken flautas; veggie voodle salad; chocolate-covered chips; apple pie soda a la mode.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada hosts a Christmas dinner for family and friends; on the menu, tortellini in parmesan brodo, risotto with clams, braised lamb shanks with escarole and radicchio and a chocolate candy cane tower.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Autumn-inspired food, including chai chocolate truffles, white velvet soup, spicy cocktail puffs and jam cocktails.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis asks her Thanksgiving guests to each bring something to add to a large antipasti platter; spicy turkey breast cacciatorel; smokey candied carrots and walnut gremolata; simple wilted greens; chocolate chunk hazelnut pie.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada hosts a holiday party for kids and transforms the house into a winter wonderland; guests get to make their own snow globes and enjoy a menu of creamy tomato soup, triple chocolate hot cocoa, crispy chicken sandwiches and Italian flag cookies.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis is ready to host this year's family Thanksgiving dinner; polenta popovers with lemon butter; baked turkey parmesan; sweet and salty mashed potatoes; chocolate pumpkin cheesecake souffle.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada treats her daughter Jade and friends to a party, where each guest makes their own gingerbread house; kid-friendly treats like s'mores popcorn, pizza grilled cheese, veggie forest with parmesan ranch dip and frozen hot chocolate affogatos.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Holiday dishes with a modern spin, including pumpkin alfredo lasagna rolls, crispy truffled turkey and caramelized apple semifreddo cake.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: A Christmas cocktail party and silly Santa gift exchange; holiday appetizers and favorite karaoke tunes; spinach artichoke panini bites; warm citrus marinated olives; chocolate coconut cake and burnt citrus cocktails.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis and her daughter, Jade, host a holiday party for friends; Jade helps prepare the menu, prep for the party and plan the activity of making homemade Christmas gifts for a teacher; the menu is a gourmet twist on kid favorites.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis hosts a fancy, vintage-inspired cocktail party and serves throwback recipes with a modern twist like bacon onion dip, a spiked gelatin mold and a Korean shrimp cocktail.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis invites her cousins to bring an appetizer over for a Christmas party, and surprise guest Aunt Raffy judges which is the best; after the highly competitive game, Giada and her guests dine on a festive buffet-style meal.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada hosts a party where guests are asked to come dressed as their favorite holiday song; guests enjoy Giada's festive menu that includes a mozzarella bar, chicken piccata skewers, slow-roasted mustard salmon and a Sparkling Cosmo Punch.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada has a step-by-step approach for planning and executing Thanksgiving; lemon and pea alfredo; sweet and savory kale salad; prosciutto wrapped turkey; for dessert, mascarpone cannoli cheesecake.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada is on a mission to recreate a family holiday recipe called miracle rice with her Aunt Raffy; the dish reflects generations of stories and memories; they also create a simple sorbet before ending the night with a grab-bag gift exchange.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada hosts family Christmas dinner and pulls out all the stops with a fun gift exchange and an elegant menu; she makes a simple standing rib roast, Blistered Baby Pepper Salad, cavatelli with Gorgonzola and tomatoes and a panettone trifle.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis hosts an open house and makes a variety of Italian-themed appetizers; goat cheese-stuffed baby peppers; crispy chicken meatballs; shrimp fra diavolo bites; chocolate Christmas tree brownies; a whiskey spritz cocktail.

programme.title: Giada's Holiday Handbook
programme.desc: A cocktail-style Thanksgiving celebration with appetizer-sized versions of beloved holiday dishes, like stuffing arancini, turkey Waldorf bites, charred brussels sprout crostini and a mulled cosmo cocktail.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: A handsome cowboy makes eyes at an immigrant miner's pretty daughter and upsets her staid European ideals. Betrothed by her father to a young miner, she forsakes him and her old-world traditions by leaving home to become an 'American lady.'

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: George and Patricia Camden, two people out of rancher Aaron McClain's shady past, blackmail him. Aided by a mysterious accomplice, McClain evens the score by murdering George, and Sheriff Hollister is plunged into a dangerous manhunt.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: European pianist Franz Lister comes to the United States to give a concert for Mona Lansing. When Lister's piano is stolen, Mona hires Paladin to get it back.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Escaped killer, Ben Jalisco, is a ruthless hunter who has murdered more than 30 men. Now he is after his wife, Lucy, who informed on him and Paladin, who brought him in.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Will prospector Possum Corbin rescue Paladin from dying in a desert, if Paladin reads the encyclopedia to him?

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is invited to best man at Rivka Shotness' wedding. When he arrives, he finds that Billy Buckstone has been freed from prison and is on his way back.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is hired to find Don Esteban, who has disappeared. When he finds him he is dressed as a knight in armor and thinks he is Don Quixote.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Two years ago, the Cattleman's Association put a bounty of $500 on a rustler who was never caught. Now they don't want him pursued but a bounty hunter doesn't know or maybe he doesn't care.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is sent a $100 bill and told there are 9 more like it.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Costigan is a land owner and cattleman. He was shot by Clemenceau, a squatter on his land. Paladin has offered to help him get rid of the squatter but doesn't approve of his methods.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: After local boozing champ Big Fontana cheats Paladin in a drink-off, sickly Boise Peabody convinced he'll die by morning, challenges the sneaky fast draw to a shootout.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin goes after a wagon-master who led the massacre of his own wagon train. Rusty Doggett hides out in a town entirely populated by wanted outlaws.

programme.title: Maverick
programme.desc: A French countess needs a loan from Bret and Bart and offers a pearl necklace as collateral, but the pair must pursue her when she splits with their $10,000.

programme.title: Maverick

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!
